content: Au The‑aufila, thawj phoo ntawv hov kuv has txug txhua yaam kws Yexu chiv ua hab qhuab qha
moog txug nub kws nwg raug coj moog sau ntuj lawm, yog ua qaab kws nwg nkaw lug huv Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kws dawb huv rua cov tubkhai kws nwg xaiv ca lawd.

Thaus nwg raug kev tswm txom taag lawm Yexu lug tshwm rua puab pum, muaj tsoob zeej timkhawv ntau yaam qha tas nwg muaj txujsa nyob. Nwg tshwm rua puab pum rua ncua swjhawm plaub caug nub hab tau has txug Vaajtswv lub tebchaws.
Thaus nwg tseed nrug puab nyob ua ke  nwg kuj nkaw lug rua puab tas, “Tsw xob tawm huv Yeluxalee moog tassws nyob tog yaam kws leej Txwv cog lug tas yuav pub lawv le mej nov kuv has lawd.
Yauhaa coj ua kevcai raus huv dej, tassws tshuav tsw ntev mej yuav ua kevcai raus huv Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kws dawb huv.”
Thaus puab tuaj txoos ua ke, puab txawm nug Yexu tas, “Tug Tswv, koj yuav muab lub tebchaws rov rua cov Yixayee kaav zag nuav lov?”
Nwg has rua puab tas, “Tsw txug mej yuav paub lub caij lub nyoog kws leej Txwv teem ca lawv le nwg muaj fwjchim teem.

Tassws mej yuav tau txais fwjchim rua thaus Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kws dawb huv nqeg lug rua sau mej, hab mej yuav ua timkhawv has txug kuv huv lub nroog Yeluxalee hab thoob plawg lub xeev Yutia hab lub xeev Xamali hab moog thoob qaab ntuj kawg.”
Thaus Yexu has le nuav taag lawd, nwg txawm raug coj moog sau ntuj rua puab saib ntsoov, hab muaj fuab laum nkaus nwg pluj plag ntawm puab qhov muag lawm.
Thaus puab tseed saib quas ntsoov rua sau ntuj rua thaus Yexu nce moog, txawm muaj ob tug yawm naav tsoog tsho dawb paug lug sawv ntawm puab ib saab,

hab has tas, “Cov tuabneeg Kalilai 'e, ua caag mej yuav sawv saib ntsoov rua sau ntuj? Tug Yexu nuav kws raug coj ncaim mej moog rua sau ntuj lawm, nwg yuav rov lug ib yaam nkaus le kws mej pum nwg nce moog rua sau ntuj ntaag.”
Tes puab txawm nqeg peg lub roob Txwv Aulib rov qaab moog rua Yeluxalee. Lub roob hov nyob ze Yeluxalee, ncua kev hov deb npaum le kws tso cai moog tau rua nub Xanpatau.

Thaus puab moog rua huv lub nroog lawm puab txawm nce moog rua txheej tsev sau yog chaav kws puab nyob, yog Petu, Yauhaa, Yakaunpau hab Anru, Fili hab Thauma, Npathaulaumai hab Mathai, Afe‑a tug tub Yakaunpau hab Ximoo kws yog ib tug Xelaute.
Puab suavdawg txawm koom ib lub sab swv zug thov Vaajtswv, hab muaj cov quaspuj hab Maivlag kws yog Yexu nam hab Yexu cov kwv koom ua ke.
Thaus ntawd Petu sawv tseeg huv plawv cov kwvtij kws nyob ua ke ntawd huvsw kwvlaam muaj ib puas neeg nkaum leej, hab nwg has tas,
“Cov kwvtij 'e, yeej los yuav tsum tav lawv le Vaajtswv txujlug kws Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kws dawb huv kuas Tavi lub qhov ncauj has txug Yutas kws coj cov kws nteg Yexu kev,
vem tub suav tas nwg yog peb cov hab muaj feem ua tej num nuav.”
(Tug hov coj cov nqe kws ndav nwg ua phem hov moog yuav ib daim teb, mas nwg poob rua huv daim teb hov ntsawm nwg lub plaab tawg ua nyuv tawm taag huvsw.
Txhua tug kws nyob huv Yeluxalee yeej paub tej xwm txheej nuav, thaaj aav hov txhad raug hu lawv le puab le lug has tas Akhentama kws txhais has tas Teb Ntshaav.)
“Muaj lug sau ca rua huv phoo Ntawv Nkauj has tas, “ ‘Ca nwg lub chaw nyob nyob do cuas, tsw kheev leejtwg nyob huv.’ hab has tas, ‘Thov kuas muaj dua ib tug lug nyob nwg chaw ua num.’
Vem le nuav ib tug huv cov kws nrug nraim peb nyob rua ncua swjhawm kws Yexu tseed moog moog lug lug huv peb,

yog txwj thaus Yauhaa muab Yexu ua kevcai raus dej moog txug nub kws Yexu raug muab coj ncaim peb moog sau ntuj lawm, mas ib tug huv cov tuabneeg nuav yuav tsum nrug peb ua timkhawv txug qhov kws Yexu caj sawv rov lug.”
Puab txhad tawm npe ob leeg, tug ib yog Yauxej kws hu ua Npaxanpa hab kuj hu ua Yuxatha, tug ob yog Mathia.
Tes puab txawm thov Vaajtswv has tas, “Tug Tswv kws paub txhua tug tuabneeg lub sab, thov qha tshwm rua peb paub tas ob tug nuav koj xaiv tug twg
lug tuav teg num nuav hab ua tubkhai nyob Yutas lub chaw kws nwg muab tso tseg es moog nyob rua lub chaw kws yeej yog nwg le.”
Puab txhad rhu ntawv mas rhu tau Mathia. Nwg txhad raug xaiv lug nrug kaum ib tug tubkhai ntawd.
Thaus txug nub Pheethekhoxate, puab suavdawg nyob ua ke huv ib qho chaw.
Taamswm ntawd txawm muaj ib lub suab sau ntuj tuaj yaam nkaus le cua daaj cua dub ntsawj hlub thoob plawg lub tsev kws puab nyob tsawg ntawd.
Txawm muaj nplaim tawg zoo le tug nplaig tshwm rua puab pum hab faib pis rhe nyob rua sau puab txhua tug.
Puab suavdawg txhad tau Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kws dawb huv puv npo hab puab chiv has lwm yaam lug lawv le Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kuas puab has.
Muaj cov Yutai kws fwm Vaajtswv tuaj txhua lub tebchaws huv qaab ntuj tuaj su rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalee.
Thaus nov lub suab ntawd, cov tuabneeg coob coob txawm tuaj ua ke, hab puab tsw pum qaab xaav vem puab nyag nov nyag yaam lug kws cov ntawd has.
Puab xaav tsw thoob hab phemfwj has tas, “Cov tuabneeg kws has nuav puavleej yog tuabneeg Kalilai los tsw yog?
Ua caag peb txhua tug nov puab has peb txhua lub tebchaws yaam lug?
Muaj cov Pathia, cov Mintia, cov Elaa hab cov kws nyob huv Mexauphautamia hab huv Yutia hab huv Khapantaukia hab huv Phautha hab huv Axia,

hab huv Fikia hab huv Pafilia hab huv Iyi, hab huv Linpia tebchaws tej thaaj kws zwm rua lub nroog Khulene, hab muaj cov kws tuaj lub nroog Loo tuaj, tsw has cov Yutai hab cov kws lug coj Yutai kevcai,
hab muaj cov Khete hab cov Alanpia, mas peb nyag taug nyag nov puab cov nuav has peb yaam lug has txug Vaajtswv tej num luj.”
Puab suavdawg txhad phemfwj hab tsw pum qaab xaav hab ib leeg has rua ib leeg tas, “Tej nuav yog daabtsw?”
Muaj ib txha thuaj luag has tas, “Yog puab qaug cawv txwv maab tshab xwb.”

Tes Petu txawm sawv tseeg nrug kaum ib tug tubkhai ua ke tsaa suab nrov has rua cov tuabneeg hov tas, “Cov tuabneeg Yutia hab suavdawg kws nyob huv Yeluxalee, mej ca le paub zaaj nuav hab noog tej lug kws kuv has.
Cov tuabneeg nuav tsw yog qaug cawv yaam le mej xaav, tsua qhov nyav cuaj teev ntxuv xwb.
Tassws tej nuav yog tej kws Yau‑ee kws ua xwbfwb cev Vaajtswv lug has ca lawm tas,

“ ‘Vaajtswv has tas, lub swjhawm kawg kuv yuav laub kuv tug Ntsuj Plig rua sau ib tsoom tuabneeg suavdawg. Mej tej tub tej ntxhais yuav cev kuv le lug, mej cov hluas yuav ua yug quas toog pum, hab mej cov laug yuav ua npau suav pum.
Lub swjhawm ntawd txawm yog kuv cov tub qhe nkauj qhev los kuv yuav laub kuv tug Ntsuj Plig rua sau puab, hab puab yuav cev kuv le lug.
Kuv ua tej txujci phemfwj tshwm sau nruab ntug hab ua txujci tseem ceeb tshwm rua huv lub nplajteb, yuav muaj ntshaav hab suavtawg hab paa nchu.
Lub nub yuav ntxeev ua tsaus ntuj, lub hli yuav ua ntshaav, ua ntej nub kws luj hab zoo kawg nkaus kws tug Tswv teem ca lug txug.
Thaus hov txhua tug kws thov hu tug Tswv lub npe yuav dim.’

“Mej cov kws yog haiv Yixayee ca le noog tej lug nuav. Yexu kws yog tuabneeg Naxale yog tug kws Vaajtswv ua tej num luj hab tej txujci tseem ceeb hab tej kws phemfwj laav nwg rua mej, yog tej kws Vaajtswv kuas Yexu ua huv plawv mej lawv kws mej tub paub lawd,

mas tug Yexu nuav raug muab cob rua mej lawv le Vaajtswv tub xaav tseg ruaj ca hab paub ua ntej lawd, mas mej txhad swv tuabneeg phem txhais teg muab nwg teem rua sau khaublig ntoo hab muab nwg tua pov tseg.
Tassws Vaajtswv tsaa nwg caj sawv rov lug hab tso nwg dim txujkev tuag tej mob, tsua qhov txujkev tuag tuav tsw tau nwg ca hlo le.
Tavi has txug Yexu tas, “ ‘Kuv pum tug Tswv nyob ntawm kuv lub hauv ntej tsw tu le. Vem nwg nyob ntawm kuv saab xws kuv txhad tsw ua zug.
Vem le hov kuv lub sab txhad xyiv faab hab kuv tug nplaig zoo sab, hab kuv lub cev txhad le nyob muaj sab vaam.
Tsua qhov koj yuav tsw muab kuv tso tseg rua huv tub tuag teb, lossws ca koj tug kws Dawb Huv lwj moog.
Koj qha txujkev kws tau txujsa rua kuv paub, koj yuav pub kuas kuv zoo sab xyiv faab kawg nkaus tsua qhov koj nrug nraim kuv.’
“Kwvtij 'e, kuv muaj sab tuab kws yuav has rua mej txug tug yawm koob Tavi tas nwg tub tuag hab muab log lawm hab nwg lub ntxaa nrug peb nyob txug naj nub nwgnuav.
Nwg yog ib tug cev Vaajtswv txujlug, nwg txhad paub tas Vaajtswv cog lug twv tseg rua nwg tas Vaajtswv yuav pub nwg caaj ceg muaj ib tug lug nyob sau nwg lub zwm txwv.
Nwg paub ua ntej hab has txug qhov kws tug Kheto  yuav caj sawv rov lug has tas Vaajtswv tsw tso nwg tseg rua huv tub tuag teb hab tsw ca nwg lub cev lwj moog.
Vaajtswv tub tsaa tug Yexu nuav caj sawv rov lug lawm, peb txhua tug ua tau timkhawv txug zaaj nuav.

Tub yog vem Yexu raug tsaa sawv lug nyob ntawm Vaajtswv saab teg xws lawm hab tau txais Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kws dawb huv ntawm leej Txwv lawv le cog lug ca lawd, Yexu txhad laub tug Ntsuj Plig hov lug lawv le mej tau pum hab nov.
Tsua qhov Tavi tsw tau nce moog rua sau ntuj, tassws nwg has tas, “ ‘Tug Tswv  has rua kuv tug tswv tas, “Ca le nyob tsawg ntawm kuv saab xws,
moog txug thaus kuv muab koj cov yeeb ncuab ua koj lub rooj tag taw.” ’
Vem le nuav, ib tsoom Yixayee suavdawg, mej ca le paub tseeb tas Vaajtswv tsaa tug Yexu nuav kws mej muab teem rua sau tug khaublig ntoo ua tug Tswv hab ua tug Kheto.”
Thaus puab nov le hov lawm kuj chob puab lub sab, puab txhad has rua Petu hab lwm tug tubkhai tas, “Kwvtij 'e, peb yuav ua le caag?”

Petu txhad has rua puab tas, “Ca le ntxeev dua sab tshab hab txhua tug ua kevcai raus dej huv Yexu Kheto lub npe sub txhad daws tau mej lub txem, mas mej yuav tau txais Vaaj Ntsuj Plig tug dawb huv kws Vaajtswv pub.
Tsua qhov tej lug cog tseg ntawd poob rua mej hab rua mej tej tub ki hab txhua tug kws nyob deb, yog txhua tug kws tug Tswv kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv hu lug cuag nwg.”
Petu tseed has ntau yaam ua timkhawv hab ntuag puab has tas, “Ca le nrhav kev dim ntawm cov tuabneeg phem tam nuav.”
Cov kws txais yuav Petu tej lug hov kuj ua kevcai raus dej, hab nub ntawd muaj tuabneeg lug tsaav rua cov ntseeg kwvlaam peb txheeb leej.
Puab rau sab ntso noog cov tubkhai qha hab koom ua ib lub sab sws raug zoo hab koom noj mov ua ke  hab thov Vaajtswv ua ke.
Cov tuabneeg suavdawg kuj ntshai, hab Vaajtswv pub cov tubkhai ua tau txujci tseem ceeb hab txujci phemfwj ntau yaam.
Cov ntseeg suavdawg nyob ua ke hab muab puab tej hov txhua chaw ua suavdawg le,
hab muab puab tej teb hab cuab txhaj cuab taam muag faib rua txhua tug lawv le cheem tsum.
Puab naj nub tuaj nyob ua ke thooj ib lub sab huv lub tuam tsev hab noj mov ua ke  huv puab tej tsev, hab ua sab dawb paug noj mov ua ke zoo sab xyiv faab,
hab qhuas Vaajtswv hab ib tsoom suavdawg txaus sab rua puab. Tug Tswv kuj pub cov kws saamswm dim naj nub tsaav coob zuj zug rua huv puab.
Muaj ib nub thaus nub qaij peb teev Petu hab Yauhaa saamswm nce moog rua huv lub tuam tsev yog lub swjhawm thov Vaajtswv.

Txawm muaj ib tug yawm kws ceg tawv thaus nruab thab lug raug muab kwv tuaj. Naj nub muaj tuabneeg muab nwg tso rua ntawm ib saab rooj loog tuam tsev, yog lub rooj loog kws hu ua Zoo Nkauj sub nwg txhad tau thov khawv ntawm cov tuabneeg kws nkaag moog rua huv lub tuam tsev.
Thaus nwg pum Petu hab Yauhaa saamswm tuaj moog rua huv lub tuam tsev, nwg txhad thov khawv.
Petu hab Yauhaa saib ntsoov rua tug hov hab has tas, “Ca le saib rua ib.”
Tug hov txawm saib ntsoov rua ob tug xaav tas yuav tau daabtsw ntawm ob tug.
Tassws Petu has tas, “Nyaj hab kub kuv tsw muaj. Yaam kws kuv muaj, kuv yuav pub rua koj. Huv Yexu Kheto kws yog tuabneeg Naxale lub npe, koj ca le sawv tseeg moog kev.”
Petu txawm ntsab nkaus nwg saab teg xws tsaa nwg sawv, mas taamswm ntawd nwg txhais kwtaw hab nwg tej cos qej txhaa txawm muaj zug.
Nwg dha caws qa sawv tseeg moog kev hab nrug ob tug nkaag rua huv lub tuam tsev, nwg moog kev dha caws qa qhuas Vaajtswv.
Ib tsoom tuabneeg pum nwg moog kev hab qhuas Vaajtswv,
hab cim tau tas tug hov yog tug kws nyob tsawg thov khawv ntawm lub rooj loog Zoo Nkauj tuam tsev. Puab txhad phemfwj hab xaav tsw thoob rua tej xwm txheej kws tshwm lug rua tug hov.
Thaus tug hov tseed tuav rawv Petu hab Yauhaa, tej tuabneeg suavdawg txawm dha lug rua ntawm puab ntawm lub chaw kws hu ua Zaaj Qaab Khaav Xalaumoo hab phemfwj kawg.

Thaus Petu pum cov tuabneeg hov nwg txawm has rua puab tas, “Haiv tuabneeg Yixayee, ua caag mej yuav xaav tsw thoob qhov xwm txheej nuav? Ua caag mej yuav saib ntsoov rua ib, yaam le ib swv ib le fwjchim hab swv ib txujkev ncaaj nceeg khu tau tug yawm nuav moog tau kev?

Aplahaa, Yiha hab Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv, yog peb tej laug tug Vaajtswv, pub lub koob meej rua nwg tug tub qhe Yexu kws mej muab cob rua luas hab tsw leeg yuav taab meeg Philaj kws tub npaaj sab yuav tso nwg dim lawm.
Tassws mej tsw leeg yuav tug kws dawb huv hab ncaaj nceeg, mej thov kuas tso tug nam tua tuabneeg rua mej.
Mej txhad muab tug kws yog txuj hauv paug sav tua pov tseg, tassws Vaajtswv tsaa nwg sawv huv qhov tuag rov lug. Peb ua timkhawv rua zaaj nuav.
Qhov kws ntseeg Yexu lub npe, mas lub npe hov txhad ua rua tug kws mej pum hab paub nuav muaj zug, hab qhov kws ntseeg Yexu ua rua tug nuav zoo hlo taab meeg mej suavdawg.
“Cov kwvtij, nwgnuav kuv paub tas mej ua le ntawd tub yog mej tsw paub, ib yaam le mej cov thawj.
Tassws tej kws Vaajtswv tub khaiv cov xwbfwb cev Vaajtswv lug tshaaj tawm ua ntej lawm tas nwg tug Kheto yuav raug tswm txom, nwg kuj ua kuas tav le nuav.
Vem le nuav ca le ntxeev dua sab tshab hab tig rov lug sub txhad ntxuav tau mej lub txem,
hab mej txhad tau swjhawm su lub sab ntawm tug Tswv lub xubndag, hab Vaajtswv txhad khaiv tug Kheto kws teem ca lawd lug rua mej, yog Yexu ntaag.

Yexu yuav tsum nyob sau ntuj ceeb tsheej moog txug lub swjhawm kws Vaajtswv ua rua ib puas tsaav yaam rov zoo le qub lawv le nwg kuas nwg cov xwbfwb dawb huv kws cev nwg lug lub qhov ncauj has thau u lug.
Mauxe has ca tas, ‘Tug Tswv kws yog Vaajtswv yuav tsaa ib tug xwbfwb cev lug ib yaam le kuv tshwm lug huv mej cov kwvtij, mas mej yuav tsum noog txhua yaam kws tug hov has rua mej.
Txhua tug kws tsw noog tug xwbfwb cev lug hov mas yuav raug puam tsuaj pluj ntawm nwg haiv tuabneeg moog.’
Cov xwbfwb kws cev Vaajtswv lug txwj Xamuyee hab cov kws ua nwg qaab puavleej tshaaj tawm txug lub swjhawm nuav.

Mej yog cov xwbfwb cev lug le tub ki hab yuav tau tej kws Vaajtswv cog tseg rua mej tej laug, yog qhov kws has rua Aplahaa tas, ‘Ib tsoom tuabneeg huv lub nplajteb yuav tau koob moov ntawm koj caaj ceg.’
Thaus Vaajtswv tsaa nwg tug tub qhe caj sawv rov lug lawd, kuj khaiv nwg tuaj cuag mej ua ntej, mej txhad tau koob moov ntawm qhov kws mej tig hlo ntawm mej tej kev txhum lug.”
Thaus ob tug tseed qha cov tuabneeg hov cov pov thawj hab tug kws ua thawj saib lub tuam tsev hab cov Xantukai txawm tuaj rua ntawm ob tug.
Puab tsw txaus sab tsua qhov kws ob tug qha hab tshaaj tawm tas muaj kev sawv huv qhov tuag rov lug huv Yexu.
Puab txhad nteg ob tug coj moog kaw ib mos kaaj ntug rua huv tsev lojfaaj vem yog tsaus ntuj lawm.
Cov tuabneeg kws nov ob tug tej lug hov muaj ntau leej ntseeg. Cov txwvneej huvsw kws ntseeg kwvlaam tswb txheeb leej.
Thaus taagkig cov kws ua thawj hab cov kev txwj quas laug hab cov xwbfwb qha Vaajtswv kevcai txawm tuaj sablaaj ua ke rua huv Yeluxalee,
nrug Ana kws yog tug tuam pov thawj hlub hab Khayafa hab Yauhaa hab Alexaantaw hab txhua tug kws yog tug tuam pov thawj hlub le caaj ceg.
Thaus puab coj Petu hab Yauhaa lug sawv ntsug taab meeg, puab nug ob tug tas, “Meb swv leejtwg le fwjchim hab swv leejtwg lub npe ua tej num nuav?”
Thaus hov Petu muaj Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kws dawb huv puv npo, nwg txawm has rua puab tas, “Mej cov thawj kws kaav cov pejxeem hab mej cov kev txwj quas laug,
yog nub nua mej tshuaj saib ib ob leeg rua qhov zoo kws ib tau ua rua ib tug tuabneeg ceg tawv hab nug tas ua le caag khu tau nwg zoo lawm,

mas mej suavdawg hab cov Yixayee suavdawg ca le paub tas tub yog vem Yexu Kheto kws yog tuabneeg Naxale lub npe kws mej muab teem rua sau tug khaublig ntoo hab Vaajtswv tsaa sawv huv qhov tuag rov lug, mas tug yawm kws sawv ntawm mej xubndag nuav txhad zoo hlo.
Yexu yog “ ‘lub pob zeb kws cov Kws ua tsev muab xyeeb tseg lawm tub rov muab lug teeb ua lub thawj rua ntawm kaum tsev lawm.’
Huv lwm tug yeej tsw muaj kev dim hlo le, tsua qhov thoob plawg huv qaab ntuj nuav tsw muaj dua ib lub npe kws pub rua tuabneeg swv cawm peb dim.”
Thaus puab pum Petu hab Yauhaa muaj sab tuab hab paub tas ob tug tsw tau kawm ntawv tsuas zoo le luas tej xwb, puab xaav tsw thoob, hab ncu tau tas ob tug txeev nrug Yexu nyob.
Tassws vem puab pum tug yawm kws zoo hov sawv ntsug ntawm ob tug ib saab, puab txhad tsw muaj lug caam hlo le lawm.
Thaus puab has kuas ob tug tawm ntawm cov thawj lub rooj sablaaj  lawm, puab txawm sablaaj tas,
“Peb yuav ua le caag rua ob tug nuav? Tsua qhov ob tug tau ua ib yaam txujci tseem ceeb rua txhua tug kws nyob huv Yeluxalee paub tseeb, mas peb tsw leeg paub kuj tsw tau le.
Peb ca le txwv ob tug kuas tsw xob has daabtsw huv lub npe nuav sub zaaj nuav txhad tsw nchaa heev quas zug moog rua huv cov pejxeem.”
Puab txhad hu ob tug lug hab txwv kuas ob tug tsw xob has lossws qha huv Yexu lub npe hlo le lawm.
Tassws Petu hab Yauhaa teb puab tas, “Mej swm xaav saib, nyob ntawm Vaajtswv xubndag tswm nyog noog mej has zoo dua le noog Vaajtswv has lov?
Tsua qhov peb tseg tsw tau qhov kws has txug tej kws peb pum hab tej kws peb nov.”

Thaus puab rov txwv tawv tawv dua tes txawm tso ob tug moog. Puab nrhav tsw tau txem rua ob tug vem puab ntshai cov pejxeem, tsua qhov txhua tug qhuas Vaajtswv vem yog tej xwm txheej kws tshwm lug hov.
Tug kws mob zoo ntawm txujci tseem ceeb hov noob nyoog plaub caug tawm xyoo lawm.
Thaus tso Petu hab Yauhaa lawm, ob tug txawm moog rua huv cov ntseeg hab pav txhua yaam kws cov pov thawj hlub hab cov kev txwj quas laug has rua ob tug.
Thaus puab nov lawm puab txawm koom ib lub sab tsaa suab thov Vaajtswv has tas, “Au tug Tswv, koj tswm lub ntuj hab lub nplajteb hab dej havtxwv hab txhua yaam kws muaj nyob huv.

Koj kuas Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kws dawb huv swv peb yawm koob Tavi kws yog koj tug qhev lub qhov ncauj has tas, “ ‘Vem le caag lwm haiv tuabneeg yuav npau tawg heev, hab tej tuabneeg ntaus tswvyim phem qhuav qhuav?
Tej vaajntxwv huv lub nplajteb kuj sawv twv, cov kws ua thawj tuaj txoos ua ke tawm tsaam tug Tswv hab nwg tug Kheto.’
Qhov tseeb huv lub nroog nuav Helauj hab Phauthi‑au Philaj hab lwm haiv tuabneeg hab cov Yixayee tuaj txoos ua ke tawm tsaam Yexu kws yog koj tug qhev kws dawb huv hab koj tsaa ca lawd,
sub puab txhad ua txhua yaam lawv le koj txhais teg hab koj lub sab tub teem tseg lawd.
Au tug Tswv, nwgnuav thov koj tsaa muag saib qhov kws puab hem, hab thov pub koj cov tub qhe muaj sab tuab has koj tej lug,
rua lub swjhawm kws koj cev koj txhais teg khu mob hab ua kuas tej txujci tseem ceeb hab txujci phemfwj tshwm lug huv Yexu kws yog koj tug tub qhe dawb huv lub npe.”
Thaus puab thov taag, lub chaw kws puab tuaj txoos ua ke hov txawm ua zug quas kais, mas puab puv npo Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kws dawb huv hab puab muaj sab tuab has Vaajtswv tej lug.
Cov kws lug ntseeg hov koom ua ib lub sab. Tsw muaj leejtwg yuav has tas nwg tej hov txhua chaw yog nwg le xwb, tassws puab muab txhua yaam ua suavdawg le.
Cov tubkhai has lug muaj fwjchim luj kawg ua timkhawv txug qhov kws tug Tswv Yexu caj sawv rov lug, hab Vaajtswv txujkev hlub nrug nraim puab txhua tug.
Mas puab cov tsw muaj ib tug tu ncua ib yaam daabtsw, tsua qhov txhua tug kws muaj laj teb hab vaaj tse kuj muab muag hab coj tej nyaj kws muag tau ntawd
tuaj tso rua ntawm cov tubkhai kwtaw, mas muab faib rua txhua tug lawv le kws cheem tsum.
Yauxej kws cov tubkhai hu tas Npananpa (kws txhais has tas, tug tub kws txhawb sab) yog ib tug Levi kws yog tuabneeg Xaipla,
nwg muaj ib daim teb, nwg muab muag hab coj cov nqe teb hov tuaj tso rua ntawm cov tubkhai kwtaw.
Muaj ib tug yawm npe hu ua Anania hab nwg tug quaspuj hu ua Xafila muag nwg tej hov txhua chaw.
Mas Anania qee cov nyaj ib txha ca, nwg tug quaspuj kuj paub hab. Nwg coj ib qho tuaj tso rua ntawm cov tubkhai kwtaw.
Petu txawm has tas, “Anania, ua caag Xataa  nyob puv nkaus huv koj lub sab kuas daag Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kws dawb huv es koj txhad qee cov nqe teb hov ib txha ca?

Thaus daim teb tseed nyob kuj yeej yog koj le los tsw yog? Thaus muab muag lawd cov nyaj yeej nyob ntawm koj ceev los tsw yog? Ua caag koj lub sab yuav xaav ua le nuav? Koj tsw tau daag tuabneeg tassws daag Vaajtswv.”
Thaus Anania nov tej lug hov nwg txawm qaug ntawg tu sav nrho. Txhua tug kws nov txug zaaj hov kuj ntshai heev kawg.
Cov hluas txawm sawv tseeg hab muab nwg lub cev tuag qhwv kwv coj moog log.
Dhau ntawd kwvlaam peb teev nwg tug quaspuj tuaj txug tub tsw paub tej xwm txheej kws tshwm lug.
Petu has rua nwg tas, “Qha rua kuv saib meb muag daim teb tau nqe npaum le nuav xwb lov?” Nwg teb tas, “Yog lauj, tau npaum kod xwb.”

Petu txawm has rua nwg tas, “Ua caag meb koom ua ib lub sab swm tug Tswv tug Ntsuj Plig? Saib maj, cov kws kwv koj tug quasyawg moog log tej kwtaw nyob ntawm qhov rooj, mas puab yuav kwv koj moog log hab.”
Taamswm ntawd nwg txawm qaug ntawg tu sav nrho ntawm Petu kwtaw. Thaus cov hluas lug txug puab pum tas tuag lawm, tes puab txawm kwv nwg lub cev tuag moog log rua ntawm nwg tug quasyawg ib saab.
Ib tsoom ntseeg hab txhua tug kws tau nov txug zaaj nuav kuj ntshai kawg le.
Muaj ntau yaam txujci tseem ceeb hab txujci phemfwj tshwm ntawm cov tubkhai txhais teg rua huv plawv cov tuabneeg. Cov ntseeg suavdawg tuaj nyob ua ke rua ntawm Zaaj Qaab Khaav Xalaumoo.
Luas lwm tug tsw kaav tuaj nrug puab koom ua ke, tassws ib tsoom tuabneeg fwm puab heev.
Muaj tuabneeg lug ntseeg coob tsaav quas zug rua cov kws ntseeg tug Tswv tsw has quaspuj quasyawg.
Cov tuabneeg kwv tej mob tawm tuaj rua ntawm tej ntug kev hab muab tso pw rua sau tej txaaj hab tej lev, sub thaus Petu taug kev tuaj moog nwg tug duab txhad yuav roog tau puab qee leej.
Tej tuabneeg kws nyob huv tej moos kws nyob ib ncig Yeluxalee kuj tuaj txoos ua ke hab coj cov tuabneeg muaj mob hab cov tuabneeg kws raug daab tuaj, mas puab txhua tug kuj zoo huvsw.
Tug tuam pov thawj hlub hab txhua tug kws nrug nwg ua ke kws yog cov Xantukai txawm khib heev.
Puab txhad nteg cov tubkhai hab muab kaw rua huv num tswv lub tsev lojfaaj.
Thaus mo ntuj tug Tswv ib tug tubkhai ntuj tuaj qheb qhov rooj tsev lojfaaj hab coj cov tubkhai tawm lug hab has tas,
“Mej ca le moog sawv ntsug huv lub tuam tsev tshaaj tawm txhua lu lug has txug txujsa tshab nuav rua cov tuabneeg noog.”

Thaus cov tubkhai tau nov le ntawd, tes kaaj ntug puab txawm nkaag rua huv lub tuam tsev hab qhuab qha. Thaus tug tuam pov thawj hlub hab cov kws nrug nwg tuaj txug puab txawm hu cov thawj lub rooj sablaaj  hab Yixayee cov kev txwj quas laug suavdawg tuaj sablaaj, hab khaiv tuabneeg moog coj cov tubkhai tom lub tsev lojfaaj lug.
Thaus cov tub teg tub taw moog txug, puab tsw pum cov tubkhai nyob huv tsev lojfaaj, puab txawm rov lug has tas,
“Peb pum lub tsev lojfaaj tseed kaw quas nreeg hab cov kws zuv tseed sawv ntawm qhov rooj, tassws thaus peb qheb qhov rooj tsw pum leejtwg nyob huv le.”
Thaus tug thawj kws saib lub tuam tsev hab cov pov thawj hlub nov tej lug nuav, kuj tsw pum qaab xaav txug cov tubkhai tas yuav ua le caag ntxwv moog.
Muaj ib tug tuaj has rua puab tas, “Saib maj, cov tuabneeg kws mej muab kaw rua huv lub tsev lojfaaj saamswm sawv ntsug qhuab qha cov pejxeem huv lub tuam tsev.”
Tug thawj kws saib lub tuam tsev hab cov tub teg tub taw kuj moog coj cov tubkhai lug, tsw ua nyaum, vem yog ntshai tsaam cov pejxeem xuas pob zeb ntaus puab.
Thaus puab coj cov tubkhai lug txug lawd kuj kuas cov tubkhai sawv taab meeg ntawm cov thawj lub rooj sablaaj hov.  Tug tuam pov thawj hlub txawm nug puab

has tas, “Peb tub txwv mej tawv tawv has tas tsw xob qhuab qha daabtsw huv lub npe hov, los mej tej lug qha tub nchaa moog thoob plawg huv Yeluxalee lawm hab mej tseed xaav muab tug hov cov ntshaav nog rua peb rws hab.”
Petu hab cov tubkhai teb tas, “Peb yuav tsum noog Vaajtswv lug heev dua le noog tuabneeg lug.
Yexu kws mej muab dai tuag rua sau tug ntoo hov, peb tej laug tug Vaajtswv tub muab tsaa caj sawv rov lug lawm.
Vaajtswv tsaa nwg nyob ntawm Vaajtswv saab teg xws ua tug thawj coj hab ua tug Cawmseej sub txhad pub tau kev ntxeev dua sab tshab hab kev zaam txem rua cov Yixayee.
Peb ua timkhawv txug zaaj nuav, hab Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kws dawb huv kws Vaajtswv pub rua cov kws noog Vaajtswv lug kuj ua timkhawv hab.”
Thaus puab nov le hov lawm, puab npau tawg heev xaav muab cov tubkhai tua pov tseg.

Tassws muaj ib tug npe hu ua Kamali‑ee nyob huv lub rooj sablaaj hov,  nwg yog ib tug Falixai hab yog ib tug xwbfwb qha Vaajtswv txuj kevcai hab yog ib tug kws cov pejxeem suavdawg fwm. Nwg txawm sawv tseeg has kuas coj cov tubkhai tawm moog saab nrau ib plag.
Nwg has rua lub rooj sablaaj tas, “Mej cov Yixayee, ca le ceev faaj zoo rua tej kws mej yuav ua rua cov tuabneeg nuav.

Tsua qhov ua ntej nuav muaj ib tug npe hu ua Thunta kws khaav tas nwg yog tuabneeg luj. Muaj kwvlaam plaub puas leej tuaj nwg tog. Tassws nwg raug tua lawm hab txhua tug kws tuaj nwg tog kuj tawg ua saab ua sua pluj taag lawm.

Dhau tug hov kuj muaj dua ib tug npe hu ua Yutas kws yog tuabneeg Kalilai tshwm lug rua ncua swjhawm kws txheeb npe. Nwg haub ntxag tuabneeg tuaj nwg tog los nwg kuj puam tsuaj lawm. Cov tuabneeg kws tuaj nwg tog kuj tawg ua saab ua sua taag.

Vem le nuav zag nuav kuv has rua mej tas, tsw xob ua le caag rua puab cov nuav, ca le tso puab moog. Yog tas tej tswvyim kws puab xaav hab tej num kws puab ua nuav lug ntawm tuabneeg lug mas yuav tsw tav.
Tassws yog lug ntawm Vaajtswv lug mej yuav muab rhuav tshem tsw tau le, ntshai tsaam yog mej tawm tsaam Vaajtswv.”
Puab kuj noog Kamali‑ee has. Puab txawm hu cov tubkhai rov lug mas muab nplawm hab txwv puab tsw xob has daabtsw huv Yexu lub npe tes txawm tso puab moog.
Cov tubkhai txawm tawm ntawm cov thawj lub rooj sablaaj moog zoo sab heev tsua qhov Vaajtswv suav tas puab tswm txaj kws yuav poob koob vem yog Yexu lub npe.
Puab naj nub qhuab qha hab tshaaj tawm tas Yexu yog tug Kheto  tsw tso tseg le tsw has huv lub tuam tsev hab huv puab tej tsev.

Lub swjhawm ntawd thaus cov thwjtim fuam vaam coob zuj zug tuaj, cov Yutai kws has tau lug Kili xwb ywg cov Yutai kws yog tuabneeg Henplais tsua qhov cov puj ntsuag Kili raug muab txhem tseg tsw tau txais tej zaub mov kws puab naj nub faib.
Kaum ob tug tubkhai txhad hu cov thwjtim suavdawg lug hab has tas, “Tsw tswm nyog peb yuav tso Vaajtswv txujlug tseg moog tu kev noj kev haus.
Vem le nuav, cov kwvtij, mej ca le xaiv xyaa leej huv mej cov kws muaj koob meej zoo hab muaj Vaaj Ntsuj Plig puv npo hab muaj tswvyim, mas peb yuav tsaa puab ua teg num nuav.
Peb cov yuav rau sab ntso thov Vaajtswv hab faib Vaajtswv txujlug.”

Puab suavdawg pum zoo le kws has ntawd, mas puab xaiv Xatefanau kws muaj kev ntseeg hab muaj Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kws dawb huv puv npo, hab Fili hab Plaukhaula hab Nikhanau hab Thimoo hab Pamena hab Nikhaulau kws yog tuabneeg Aathi‑au kws coj Yutai kevcai.
Puab coj cov tuabneeg nuav lug sawv rua ntawm cov tubkhai xubndag mas cov tubkhai thov Vaajtswv paab puab hab muab teg npuab sau puab.
Vaajtswv txujlug nrov nchaa quas lug. Cov kws lug ua thwjtim kuj tsaav coob quas zug tuaj rua huv Yeluxalee, hab muaj cov pov thawj ntau leej lug ntseeg hab noog lug.
Xatefanau kws muaj txujkev hlub hab fwjchim puv npo ua tej txujci tseem ceeb hab txujci phemfwj huv plawv cov tuabneeg.

Muaj qee leej kws tuaj ntawm lub tsev sablaaj kws hu tas cov tuabneeg ywj pheej  lub tsev sablaaj hab cov kws tuaj huv lub moos Khulene hab lub nroog Alexaantia tuaj hab cov kws nyob huv lub xeev Khilikia hab lub xeev Axia, puab cov hov txawm tuaj nrug Xatefanau sws caam.
Tassws puab tsw muaj peevxwm caam tau nwg tug tswvyim hab tej lug kws Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kuas nwg has.
Puab txawm ua tuabywv moog tshaum kuas tuabneeg has tas, “Peb nov tug nuav has lug tuam mom Mauxe hab Vaajtswv.”
Puab tshaum cov tuabneeg hab cov kev txwj quas laug hab cov xwbfwb qha Vaajtswv kevcai kuas ntxhuv. Tes puab txawm tuaj nteg Xatefanau coj moog rua cov thawj lub rooj sablaaj,
mas kuas cuav timkhawv tuaj tum has tas, “Tug yawm nuav has lug tawm tsaam lub chaw dawb huv nuav hab Vaajtswv txuj kevcai tsw tu le,
tsua qhov peb nov nwg has tas tug Yexu nuav kws yog tuabneeg Naxale yuav rhuav tshem lub chaw nuav hab yuav hloov tej kevcai kws Mauxe muab cob rua peb lawd.”
Txhua tug kws nyob huv cov thawj lub rooj sablaaj hov saib ntsoov rua Xatefanau pum tas nwg lub ntsej muag zoo yaam le ib tug tubkhai ntuj.
Tug tuam pov thawj hlub txawm nug tas, “Zaaj nuav muaj tseeb lov?”

Xatefanau has tas, “Mej cov kwvtij hab cov kws ua hlub, ca le noog kuv has. Vaajtswv kws muaj fwjchim ci ntsaa ab tshwm rua peb yawm koob Aplahaa rua thaus nwg tseed nyob huv Mexauphautamia tebchaws ua ntej kws nwg tsw tau moog nyob rua lub moos Halaa,
mas has rua nwg tas, ‘Koj ca le tawm huv koj lub tebchaws hab tawm huv koj cov kwvtij moog rua lub tebchaws kws kuv yuav qha rua koj.’

Aplahaa txhad tawm huv cov Kheentia tebchaws moog nyob rua huv lub moos Halaa. Thaus nwg txwv tuag lawd, Vaajtswv txhad kuas nwg tawm qhov ntawd lug nyob rua huv lub tebchaws kws mej nyob txug naj nub nwgnuav.

Tassws Vaajtswv tsw pub nwg muaj qub txeeg qub teg rua huv lub tebchaws, tsw pub nwg muaj ib daim aav daav le xwb taw. Hab thaus nwg tsw tau muaj mivnyuas Vaajtswv cog lug tseg tas yuav pub lub tebchaws ua nwg le teej tug hab ua nwg caaj ceg le.
Vaajtswv has rua nwg tas, ‘Koj caaj ceg yuav moog tsuam nyob rua huv lwm tebchaws hab cov tuabneeg huv lub tebchaws hov yuav muab puab ua qhev hab tswm txom puab ntev txug plaub puas xyoo,
tassws kuv yuav rau txem rua lub tebchaws kws puab ua qhev ntawd.’ Hab Vaajtswv has tas, ‘ Dhau ntawd, puab yuav tawm lug hab ua koom rua kuv ntawm lub chaw nuav.’

Vaajtswv txhad muab kevcai txav rua nwg ua lu lug cog tseg. Vem le nuav Aplahaa txhad yug tau Yiha hab muab nwg ua kevcai txav rua nub kws yim. Yiha yug tau Yakhauj, hab Yakhauj yug tau kaum ob tug tub kws yog peb yawm koob.
“Cov yawm koob hov khib Yauxej txhad muab nwg muag moog rua Iyi tebchaws. Tassws Vaajtswv nrug nraim Yauxej,

hab cawm nwg dim huv txhua yaam kev txom nyem hab pub nwg muaj tswvyim hab txaus Iyi tug vaajntxwv Falau lub sab. Falau txhad tsaa Yauxej ua tug kaav Iyi tebchaws hab txhua yaam huv vaajntxwv lub tsev.
Tes txawm muaj kev tshaib plaab thoob plawg Iyi tebchaws hab Khana‑aa tebchaws mas raug kev txom nyem heev, peb yawm koob txhad nrhav tsw tau mov noj.
Thaus Yakhauj nov tas huv Iyi tebchaws muaj mov noj nwg txhad khaiv peb cov yawm koob moog zag ib.
Thaus moog zag ob Yauxej txhad qha nwg rua cov kwvtij paub, hab Falau kuj paub txug Yauxej tsev tuabneeg.
Yauxej txhad hu nwg txwv Yakhauj hab cov kwvtij huvsw xyaa caum tswb leeg lug.
Yakhauj txhad moog rua Iyi tebchaws mas nwg hab peb cov yawm koob tuag taag rua hov ntawd,
hab coj moog rua lub moos Sekhee muab log rua huv lub qhov ntxaa kws Aplahaa muab nyaj yuav ntawm Hamau cov tub kws nyob huv Sekhee.
“Tassws thaus ze lub swjhawm kws Vaajtswv cog lug rua Aplahaa, haiv tuabneeg Yixayee fuam vaam coob heev rua huv Iyi tebchaws
moog txug thaus ib tug vaajntxwv kws tsw paub Yauxej sawv lug kaav Iyi tebchaws.
Tug vaajntxwv hov txhad ua phem rua peb haiv tuabneeg hab tswm txom peb tej laug yuam puab muab puab tej mivnyuas mog pov tseg kuas tuag.
Lub swjhawm ntawd kuj yug Mauxe, mas nwg zoo nraug heev, hab tu nwg tau peb lub hlis rua huv nwg txwv lub tsev.
Thaus Mauxe raug muab tso tseg rua saab nrau, Falau tug ntxhais coj lug tu ua nwg le tub.
Mauxe txhad tau kawm cov Iyi txhua yaam kev txawj ntse, nwg txhad muaj zoo ncauj lug hab txawj ua num.
“Thaus nwg noob nyoog plaub caug xyoo, nwg xaav moog tshaam nwg cov kwvtij kws yog Yixayee caaj ceg.
Thaus nwg pum ib tug raug tswm txom nwg txhad moog paab tug kws raug tswm txom hab muab tug Iyi hov tua pauj taub.
Nwg xaav tas nwg cov kwvtij nkaag sab tas Vaajtswv swv nwg txhais teg tso puab dim, tassws puab tsw nkaag sab le ntawd.
Nub tom qaab nwg tuaj ntswb ob tug saamswm sws caav hab nwg xaav kuas ob tug rov sws zoo txawm cheem tas, ‘Ob tug 'e, meb yog kwvtij, ua caag ib leeg yuav ua phem rua ib leeg?’
Tug kws ua phem rua nwg tug kwvtij txawm thawb Mauxe tswv moog hab has tas, ‘Leejtwg tsaa koj ua tug kws kaav peb hab ua tug kws txav txem rua peb?
Koj npaaj sab yuav tua kuv ib yaam le naag koj tua tug Iyi hab lov?’
Thaus Mauxe nov lu lug hov nwg txawm tswv moog tsuam nyob huv Mintee tebchaws hab muaj ob tug tub hov ntawd.
“Thaus nyob tau plaub caug xyoo muaj ib tug tubkhai ntuj ua nplaim tawg tshwm lug rua Mauxe pum ntawm tsob ntoo huv tebchaws moj saab qhua ntawm lub roob Xinai.
Thaus Mauxe pum, nwg xaav tsw thoob rua tej kws nwg pum hov. Thaus nwg moog saib ze ze, nwg nov tug Tswv lub suab has tas,
‘Kuv yog koj cov yawm koob tug Vaajtswv, yog Aplahaa, Yiha hab Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv.’ Mauxe txhad ntshai tshee quas nyo tsw kaav saib.
Tug Tswv has rua Mauxe tas, ‘Ca le hle koj nkawm khau tseg vem tas qhov chaw kws koj sawv nuav yog lub chaw dawb huv.

Kuv tub pum kuv haiv tuabneeg kws nyob huv Iyi tebchaws txujkev txom nyem lawm hab tub nov puab lub suab quaj lawm, hab kuv nqeg lug yuav cawm puab dim. Ca le lug, kuv yuav khaiv koj moog rua huv Iyi tebchaws.’

“Tug Mauxe nuav kws puab tsw leeg yuav hab has tas, ‘Leejtwg tsaa koj ua tug kaav peb hab ua tug txav txem rua peb?’ mas Vaajtswv swv tug tubkhai ntuj txhais teg kws tshwm rua Mauxe pum huv tsob ntoo hov khaiv tug Mauxe nuav moog ua tug thawj kaav hab tug kws cawm puab dim.
Nwg yog tug coj puab tawm lug, hab ua txujci tseem ceeb hab tej kev phemfwj huv Iyi tebchaws hab huv dej Havtxwv Lab hab huv tebchaws moj saab qhua plaub caug xyoo.
Tug nuav yog tug Mauxe kws has rua cov Yixayee tas, ‘Vaajtswv yuav tsaa ib tug xwbfwb cev lug tshwm lug huv mej cov kwvtij ib yaam le kuv.’

Tug nuav yog tug kws nrug ib tsoom tuabneeg nyob huv tebchaws moj saab qhua hab nrug tug tubkhai ntuj kws has lug rua nwg nyob ntawm roob Xinai hab nrug peb tej laug nyob. Nwg txais tej lug kws pub txujsa coj lug rua peb.
Peb tej laug tsw noog Mauxe has. Puab muab nwg thawb tswv moog hab puab lub sab faav hlo rov moog rua Iyi tebchaws.
Puab has rua Aloo tas, ‘Ca le ua tej txoov daab rua peb kws yuav coj peb kev moog. Tug Mauxe kws coj peb tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug peb tsw paub sov nwg ua le caag lawm.’
Puab txhad ua ib tug txoov daab thaav nyuj hab coj hov txhua chaw tuaj xyeem rua tug txoov daab hov hab zoo sab xyiv faab rua tej kws puab txhais teg ua.

Mas Vaajtswv fee plhu tso puab moog pe lub nub lub hli hab tej nub qub sau nruab ntug huvsw, lawv le muaj lug sau ca rua huv cov xwbfwb cev lug phoo ntawv has tas, “ ‘Yixayee caaj ceg 'e, mej tau tua tsaj xyeem hab muab hov txhua chaw xyeem rua kuv huv tebchaws moj saab qhua tau plaub caug xyoo lov?
Mej kwv daab Maulej lub tsev ntaub hab mej tug daab Lefaa lub nub qub, yog ob tug txoov daab kws mej txua rua mej pe. Hab kuv yuav kuav mej moog dhau plhawv lub nroog Npanpiloo.’
“Thaus peb tej laug nyob huv tebchaws moj saab qhua puab muaj lub tsev ntaub kws ua timkhawv, lawv le Vaajtswv kuas Mauxe ua, yog ua lawv tug qauv kws Mauxe tau pum.

Thaus peb tej laug tau lub tsev ntaub hov lawm puab kuj kwv nrug Yausua lug rua thaus puab txeeb tau lub tebchaws ntawm tej haiv tuabneeg kws Vaajtswv ntab tswv ntawm peb tej laug xubndag lawm. Lub tsev ntaub hov kuj nyob lug txug thaus Tavi swm neej.
Vaajtswv hlub Tavi, Tavi txhad thov Vaajtswv ca nwg npaaj ib lub chaw rua Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv nyob.
Tassws Xalaumoo yog tug kws ua lub tuam tsev rua Vaajtswv.
Txawm yog le ntawd los Vaajtswv kws luj dua ndais tsw nyob huv lub tuam tsev kws tuabneeg txhais teg ua, lawv le tug xwbfwb cev lug has tas,
“ ‘Lub ntuj yog kuv lub zwm txwv, lub nplajteb yog kuv lub rooj tag taw. Tug Tswv has tas, Mej yuav ua lub tsev zoo le caag rua kuv, hab kuv lub chaw su yuav nyob hovtwg?
Tej nuav yog kuv txhais teg ua huvsw los tsw yog?’
“Mej cov nam tuabneeg tawv ncauj, sab tawv  hab laag ntseg, mej pheej taav Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kws dawb huv tsw tu ncua. Mej tej laug ua le caag lawm, mej kuj ua ib yaam le ntawd.

Puas muaj ib tug xwbfwb cev lug kws mej tej laug tsw tau muab tswm txom? Puab tua cov kws tshaaj tawm txug tom hauv ntej tas tug ncaaj nceeg yuav lug, yog tug kws nwgnuav mej tub faav xeeb rua hab muab tua lawm.
Mej tub tau txais txuj kevcai kws cov tubkhai ntuj has rua mej los mej tsw tuav rawv txuj kevcai ntawd.”
Thaus puab nov tej lug ntawd mas puab npau tawg heev hab zawm nav quas zog rua Xatefanau.
Tassws Xatefanau puv npo Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kws dawb huv, nwg tsaa muag saib sau ntuj pum Vaajtswv tug fwjchim ci ntsaa quas ab hab pum Yexu sawv ntawm Vaajtswv saab teg xws.
Nwg has tas, “Saib maj, kuv pum rooj ntug qheb hab Tuabneeg leej Tub sawv ntawm Vaajtswv saab teg xws.”
Tes puab txawm qw nrov hab ntsaws qhov ntsej dha ib tsaug lug rua ntawm Xatefanau.
Puab muab nwg thawb tawm huv lub nroog hab xuas pob zeb ntaus. Cov kws ua timkhawv nkaug Xatefanau kuj hle tej tsho ca rua ntawm ib tug hluas kws hu ua Xolau kwtaw.
Thaus puab saamswm xuas pob zeb ntaus Xatefanau, nwg thov has tas, “Tug Tswv Yexu, thov txais kuv tug ntsuj plig.”
Tes Xatefanau txawm txhus caug ndua qw nrov nrov has tas, “Tug Tswv, thov tsw xob muab lub txem kws puab ua nuav rua puab rws.” Thaus has le nuav lawm nwg txawm tu sav lawm.

Xolau kuj pum zoo qhov kws tua Xatefanau. Thaus ntawd pawg ntseeg huv lub nroog Yeluxalee raug kev tswm txom heev. Puab txhad le tswv tawg ua saab ua sua moog thoob plawg lub xeev Yutia hab lub xeev Xamali tsuas yog tseg cov tubkhai nyob xwb.
Cov kws fwm Vaajtswv kuj muab Xatefanau log hab quaj mob sab nwg kawg.
Xolau rhuav tshem cov pawg ntseeg heev, nwg nkaag moog chua caab cov quaspuj quasyawg huv puab tej tsev coj moog kaw rua huv tsev lojfaaj.
Cov kws tswv tawg ua saab ua sua kuj moog pav txuj xuv zoo rua txhua qhov.
Fili txhad moog rua huv ib lub moos kws nyob huv lub xeev Xamali, hab tshaaj tawm txug tug Kheto rua puab noog.
Thaus cov tuabneeg nov Fili has hab pum tej txujci tseem ceeb kws nwg ua, puab suavdawg kub sab noog nwg tej lug,
tsua qhov daab qw nrov tawm huv ntau leej moog, hab ntau leej kws tuag cev tuag teg tuag taw kuj zoo hlo.
Lub moos hov txhad xyiv faab kawg.
Muaj ib tug yawm hu ua Ximoo txeev ua khawv koob yeeg swv huv lub moos hov. Nwg ua rua cov tuabneeg Xamali phemfwj, hab nwg khaav tas nwg yog ib tug tseem ceeb.
Cov tuabneeg suavdawg tug hlub tug yau kub sab noog tug hov has hab puab has tas, “Tug nuav yog Vaajtswv tug fwjchim kws hu ua tug fwjchim luj kawg nkaus.”
Puab kub sab noog nwg tsua qhov nwg ua khawv koob yeeg swv rua puab phemfwj ntev lug lawm.
Tassws thaus Fili pav txuj xuv zoo has txug Vaajtswv lub tebchaws hab Yexu Kheto lub npe, mas puab kuj ntseeg Fili tej lug hab puab cov quaspuj quasyawg ua kevcai raus dej.
Ximoo kuj ntseeg hab thaus nwg ua kevcai raus dej lawm nwg kuj nrug Fili nyob ntxwv moog. Thaus nwg pum tej txujci tseem ceeb hab tej kev phemfwj kws Fili ua nwg xaav tsw thoob le.
Thaus cov tubkhai kws nyob huv Yeluxalee tau nov tas cov Xamali kuj txais yuav Vaajtswv tej lug lawm, puab txawm khaiv Petu hab Yauhaa moog cuag cov Xamali.
Thaus ob tug tuaj txug, ob tug thov Vaajtswv paab kuas puab txais tau Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kws dawb huv,
tsua qhov Vaaj Ntsuj Plig tsw tau lug rua huv puab leejtwg le, puab tsuas yog ua kevcai raus dej huv tug Tswv Yexu lub npe xwb.
Ob tug txawm tsaa teg npuab rua sau puab mas puab kuj tau txais Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kws dawb huv.
Thaus Ximoo pum tas qhov kws ob tug tubkhai tsaa teg npuab pub tau Vaaj Ntsuj Plig rua puab, tes nwg txawm coj nyaj tuaj rua ob tug,
has tas, “Thov pub tug fwjchim nuav rua kuv hab sub thaus kuv tsaa teg npuab leejtwg tug hov txhad tau txais Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kws dawb huv.”
Petu txawm has rua Ximoo tas, “Ca koj cov nyaj hab koj tug kheej raug puam tsuaj ua ke, tsua qhov koj xaav tas tej kws Vaajtswv pub nuav koj tshwm nyaj yuav tau.
Koj tsw muaj feem daabtsw koom teg num nuav tsua qhov koj lub sab tsw ncaaj rua Vaajtswv.
Vem le nuav koj ca le ntxeev dua sab ntawm koj txujkev phem nuav hab thov tug Tswv saib, tej zag nwg yuav zaam tej kws koj xaav huv koj lub sab,
tsua qhov kuv pum tas koj poob rua huv kev khib sab, hab txujkev phem muab koj khi lawm.”
Ximoo txawm teb tas, “Thov koj thov tug Tswv paab kuv sub tej kws koj has ntawd txhad tsw raug kuv ib yaam hlo le.”
Thaus ob tug tubkhai ua timkhawv hab qha tug Tswv tej lug taag lawm, ob tug txawm rov moog rua Yeluxalee, ob tug pav txuj xuv zoo huv Xamali ntau lub zog taug kev moog.

Tug Tswv ib tug tubkhai ntuj has rua Fili tas, “Ca le sawv tseeg moog rua saab nraag moog kuas txug txujkev kws moog lub nroog Yeluxalee moog txug lub moos Kaxa.” (Yog txujkev kws hlaa tebchaws moj saab qhua.)

Fili txawm sawv tseeg moog, na cav ntswb ib tug yawm nraug saam kws yog tuabneeg Ethi‑aupia, yog cov Ethi‑aupia tug puj vaaj Khantake tug tim xyoob kws saib tug puj vaaj lub txhaab nyaj huvsw. Nwg moog pe Vaajtswv huv Yeluxalee lug.
Thaus nwg caij tsheb neeg rov qaab, nwg saamswm nyeem xwbfwb Yaxaya kws cev Vaajtswv lug phoo ntawv.
Vaaj Ntsuj Plig txawm has rua Fili tas, “Ca le moog ti nkaus lub tsheb ntawd.”
Fili txawm dha moog txug mas nov nwg nyeem xwbfwb Yaxaya kws cev Vaajtswv lug phoo ntawv, txhad nug tas, “Koj nkaag sab tej kws koj nyeem los tsw nkaag?”
Tug nraug saam teb tas, “Yog tsw muaj leejtwg txhais yuav ua le caag nkaag sab tau?” Nwg txawm hu Fili nce nrug nwg caij sau lub tsheb neeg.

Vaajtswv txujlug kws nwg nyeem hov yog nqai kws has tas, “Nwg raug coj moog tua ib yaam le tug yaaj, hab ib yaam le tug mivnyuas yaaj nyob tuabywv ntawm tug kws txav plaub xubndag le caag, nwg kuj tsw rua ncauj ib yaam le hov.
Thaus nwg raug luas saib tsw taug nwg tsw tau txais kev txav txem ncaaj. Leejtwg yuav has tau txug nwg caaj ceg? Tsua qhov nwg txujsa tub raug muab rhu huv lub nplajteb lawm.”
Tug nraug saam has rua Fili tas, “Thov koj qha kuv saib, qhov kws tug xwbfwb cev lug has nuav yog nwg has txug nwg tug kheej los yog has txug lwm tug?”
Fili txhad qheb ncauj chiv pav ntawm Vaajtswv txujlug nqai hov moog, nwg pav txuj xuv zoo has txug Yexu rua tug nraug saam noog.

Thaus saamswm taug kev moog ob tug txawm moog txug ib qho chaw kws muaj dej, mas tug nraug saam txawm has tas, “Saib maj, ntawm nuav muaj dej. Muaj daabtsw khuam cheem ua rua kuv ua tsw tau kevcai raus dej?”
Tes nwg txawm kuas lub tsheb neeg nreg, mas Fili hab tug nraug saam nqeg rua huv dej hab Fili muab nwg ua kevcai raus dej.
Thaus ob tug nce huv dej lug, tug Tswv tug Ntsuj Plig txawm coj Fili moog lawm. Tug nraug saam tsw rov pum dua Fili, nwg taug kev moog zoo sab xyiv faab.
Tassws Fili tshwm rua huv lub moos Axautha hab thaus nwg taug kev moog nwg pav txuj xuv zoo rua txhua lub moos moog txug thaus nwg tuaj txug lub moos Xixaleya.
Xolau ua nyaum heev has tas yuav tua tug Tswv cov thwjtim nwg txhad moog cuag tug tuam pov thawj hlub
thov ntawv tso cai moog rua tej tsev sablaaj huv lub nroog Ntamaxaka, es yog ntswb leejtwg taug Yexu Txujkev tsw has quaspuj quasyawg, mas yuav nteg khi coj lug rua huv Yeluxalee.
Thaus Xolau saamswm taug kev moog yuav txug lub nroog Ntamaxaka, taamswm ntawd txawm muaj ib tug duab ci nplaag sau ntuj tuaj vej nkaus nwg.
Nwg txhad qaug ntawg rua huv peg teb hab nov ib lub suab has tas, “Xolau, Xolau, ua caag koj tswm txom kuv?”
Xolau txhad has tas, “Tug Tswv, koj yog leejtwg?” Tug Tswv teb tas, “Kuv yog Yexu kws koj saamswm tswm txom.
Ca le sawv tseeg nkaag moog rua huv lub nroog, yuav muaj tuabneeg qha rua koj paub tas koj yuav tsum ua daabtsw.”
Cov kws nrug nwg taug kev moog kuj nreg yoob taag. Puab nov lub suab tassws tsw pum leejtwg.
Xolau sawv huv peg teb lug, thaus nwg qheb muag nwg kuj tsw pum kev. Puab txhad tuav nwg teg coj moog rua huv lub nroog Ntamaxaka.
Nwg qhov muag dig tau peb nub, hab nwg tsw noj tsw haus daabtsw le.
Huv lub nroog Ntamaxaka muaj ib tug thwjtim npe hu ua Anania. Tug Tswv ua yug quas toog has rua nwg tas, “Anania 'e.” Nwg teb tas, “Tug Tswv, kuv nyob ntawm nuav.”
Tug Tswv has rua nwg tas, “Ca le sawv tseeg moog kuas txug txujkev kws hu ua Kev Ncaaj, hab moog nrhav Xolau kws yog tuabneeg Thaxa huv Yutas lub tsev, tsua qhov Xolau saamswm thov Vaajtswv,
hab nwg ua yug quas toog pum ib tug yawm npe hu ua Anania tuaj muab teg npuab rua sau nwg sub nwg txhad rov pum kev.”
Tassws Anania teb tas, “Kuv tau nov ntau leej has txug tug yawm hov tas nwg tub ua phem heev npaum le caag rua koj cov xuv dawb huv Yeluxalee.
Hab nwg tau ntawv tso cai ntawm cov pov thawj hlub kuas tuaj nteg txhua tug kws tuav koj lub npe thov.”
Tassws tug Tswv has rua nwg tas, “Ca le moog, tsua qhov nwg yog kuv tej cuab yeej kws kuv xaiv ca lawm. Nwg yuav coj kuv lub npe moog has rua lwm haiv tuabneeg hab tej vaajntxwv hab cov Yixayee.
Kuv yuav qha rua nwg paub tas nwg yuav raug kev tswm txom npaum le caag vem yog saib rua kuv lub npe.”

Tes Anania txawm moog hab nkaag moog rua huv lub tsev hov. Nwg tsaa teg npuab sau Xolau hab has tas, “Kwv Xolau 'e, tug Tswv khaiv kuv tuaj, yog Yexu kws tshwm rua koj pum thaus koj taug kev tuaj, sub koj txhad rov pum kev hab muaj Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kws dawb huv puv npo.”
Taamswm ntawd muaj ib yaam zoo le daim nplai poob ntawm nwg lub qhov muag lug nwg txhad rov pum kev, nwg txhad sawv tseeg ua kevcai raus dej,
hab noj mov hab rov muaj zug tuaj. Xolau nrug cov thwjtim huv lub nroog Ntamaxaka nyob ntau nub.
Hab taamswm ntawd nwg tshaaj tawm txug Yexu rua huv tej tsev sablaaj has tas, “Yexu yog Vaajtswv leej Tub.”

Suavdawg kws tau nov nwg has kuj phemfwj sws thaam has tas, “Tug nuav yog tug kws ua phem kawg rua cov kws tuav lub npe nuav thov huv Yeluxalee los tsw yog? Qhov kws nwg tuaj nuav tub yog nwg tuaj nteg cov ntawd khi coj moog rua cov pov thawj hlub ntaag los tsw yog?”
Tassws Xolau muaj zug zuj zug tuaj hab ua rua cov Yutai kws nyob huv Ntamaxaka tsw pum qaab xaav tsua qhov nwg qha rua suavdawg paub tseeb tas Yexu yog tug Kheto.
Dhau ntawd ntau nub cov Yutai txawm tuav huv yuav tua Xolau,
tassws puab tug tswvyim tub nrov moog txug Xolau lawm. Puab zuv ntawm rooj loog nruab nub mo ntuj yuav tua Xolau.
Tassws cov thwjtim muab Xolau nyob rua huv ib lub tawb luj tso dauv ntawm ntsaa loog mo ntuj moog lawm.
Thaus Xolau moog txug huv lub nroog Yeluxalee lawm nwg yooj xeeb yuav koom nrug cov thwjtim ua ke, tassws puab suavdawg ntshai vem tsw ntseeg tas Xolau ua thwjtim lawm.

Mas Npananpa coj Xolau moog cuag cov tubkhai hab pav rua puab noog tas Xolau pum tug Tswv kws has rua nwg ntawm ntog kev le caag hab nwg tub muaj lub sab tuab qha huv Yexu lub npe rua huv lub nroog Ntamaxaka le caag lawm.
Tes Xolau txhad koom tau nrug cov tubkhai moog moog lug lug huv lub nroog Yeluxalee. Nwg muaj sab tuab qhuab qha huv tug Tswv lub npe.
Hab nwg nrug cov Yutai kws has tau lug Kili xwb sws has hab sws caam, mas puab cov hov kuj nrhav kev muab nwg tua.
Thaus cov kwvtij paub zaaj nuav, puab txawm coj nwg moog rua lub moos Xixaleya hab xaa nwg moog rua lub moos Thaxa.

Cov pawg ntseeg thoob plawg Yutia, Kalilai hab Xamali txhad nyob sab tug yeeg hab luj hlub. Txhua tug ua lub neej paub ntshai tug Tswv hab tau kev txhawb sab ntawm Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kws dawb huv, cov pawg ntseeg txhad fuam vaam coob tuaj.
Thaus Petu moog moog lug lug rua txhua qhov nwg moog txug Vaajtswv cov xuv dawb kws nyob huv lub moos Linta.
Nwg ntswb ib tug yawm npe hu ua Aine‑a hov ntawd, nwg tuag cev pw sau txaaj tau yim xyoo lawm.
Petu has rua nwg tas, “Aine‑a, Yexu Kheto khu koj zoo. Ca le sawv tseeg khaws koj lub chaw pw.” Taamswm ntawd nwg txawm sawv tseeg.
Thaus cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub moos Linta hab ntawm lub taj Saloo pum nwg zoo, puab kuj tig lug cuag tug Tswv.
Huv lub moos Yaupa muaj ib tug puj kws yog thwjtim hu ua Thanpitha kws lug Kili hu ua Ntaukha.  Tug puj nuav pheej ua zoo rua luas hab paab cov txom nyem ntau heev.
Lub swjhawm ntawd tug puj hov txawm mob hab tuag lawm. Thaus puab muab nwg lub cev ntxuav puab muab nwg tso rua ib chaav txheej sau.
Lub moos Linta nyob ze lub moos Yaupa. Thaus cov thwjtim nov tas Petu nyob hov ntawd, puab txawm khaiv ob tug moog thov nwg has tas, “Thov koj tuaj cuag peb sai sai.”

Petu txawm sawv tseeg nrug ob tug moog. Thaus Petu moog txug lawm puab coj nwg moog rua chaav kws nyob txheej sau. Cov puj ntsuag suavdawg kuj sawv ntsug vej Petu quaj hab qha nwg saib txhua yaam tsoog tsho kws Ntaukha ua thaus nwg tseed muaj txujsa nyob.

Petu txawm kuas puab suavdawg tawm moog saab nrau mas nwg txawm txhus caug thov Vaajtswv hab tig lug has rua tug tuag tas, “Thanpitha, ca le sawv tseeg.” Thanpitha txawm qheb muag pum Petu hab sawv lug nyob tsawg.
Petu cev teg moog nqug nwg sawv. Nwg hu cov xuv dawb hab cov puj ntsuag rov lug hab muab tug puj kws caj rov lug hov cob rua puab.
Tej xwm txheej hov nrov nchaa thoob plawg lub moos Yaupa, hab muaj tuabneeg coob coob lug ntseeg tug Tswv.
Petu nyob huv lub moos Yaupa ntau nub, nwg su huv Ximoo kws yog tug Kws luam tawv lub tsev.
Muaj ib tug yawm npe hu ua Khaunelia nyob huv lub moos Xixaleya, nwg yog ib tug thawj rog kws kaav ib puas leej nyob huv paab tub rog kws hu ua Ithali Paab.
Nwg hab nwg tsev tuabneeg coj Vaajtswv kevcai nruj hab paub ntshai Vaajtswv, nwg pub rua tej tuabneeg txom nyem ntau heev hab thov Vaajtswv tsw tu ncua.
Thaus kwvlaam nub qaij peb teev tug thawj rog hov ua yug quas toog pum ib tug tubkhai ntuj lug has rua nwg tas, “Khaunelia 'e.”

Nwg saib dheev tug tubkhai ntuj hov hab ntshai heev hab has tas, “Yawm hlub, nuav yog daabtsw?” Tug tubkhai ntuj has rua nwg tas, “Koj tej lug thov hab tej kws koj muab pub rua luas tub nce moog txug Vaajtswv ua lub chaw kws Vaajtswv ncu txug koj lawm.
Nwgnuav koj ca le khaiv tuabneeg moog rua lub moos Yaupa hab coj Ximoo kws hu ua Petu tuaj.
Nwg nyob huv tug Ximoo Kws luam tawv lub tsev kws nyob ntawm ntug havtxwv.”
Thaus tug tubkhai ntuj kws has rua nwg moog lawm, Khaunelia txawm hu ob tug tub qhe hab ib tug tub rog kws fwm Vaajtswv nruj huv cov kws ua koom rua nwg lug.
Thaus nwg pav txhua yaam rua puab noog lawm nwg khaiv puab moog rua lub moos Yaupa.
Nub tom qaab thaus peb tug nuav taug kev moog yuav txug lub moos Yaupa mas kwvlaam taav su Petu txawm nce moog thov Vaajtswv sau txheej tsev laag tshaav.
Nwg txawm tshaib plaab xaav noj mov. Thaus puab tseed ua su nwg txawm ua yug quas toog
pum rooj ntug qheb hab pum ib yaam zoo le ib daim ntaub daav daav khi plaub lub kaum tso nqeg lug rua huv lub nplajteb.
Huv daim ntaub hov muaj txhua yaam tsaj plaub txhais teg taw, hab tsaj nkaag huv aav hab naag noog sau nruab ntug.
Txawm muaj ib lub suab has tuaj rua nwg has tas, “Petu, ca le sawv tseeg muab tua noj.”
Petu has tas, “Tsw tau, tug Tswv. Yaam kws qas hab tsw dawb huv kuv tsw txeev noj hlo le.”
Lub suab rov has zag ob rua nwg tas, “Yaam kws Vaajtswv muab ntxuav lawm koj tsw xob has tas qas.”
Muaj le hov txug peb zag tes daim ntaub txawm raug muab nqaa moog rua sau ntuj taamswm lawm.

Thaus Petu tseem tsw pum qaab xaav txug zaaj yug quas toog hov lub ntsab yog daabtsw, tes taamswm ntawd cov tuabneeg kws Khaunelia khaiv tuaj txawm tuaj nug nrhav tau Ximoo lub tsev. Puab tuaj txug sawv saab nrau rooj vaag,
hab hu nug tas tug Ximoo kws hu ua Petu puas nyob ntawm nuav.
Thaus Petu tseed saamswm xaav txug zaaj yug quas toog hov, Vaaj Ntsuj Plig txawm has rua nwg tas, “Saib maj, muaj peb tug yawm tuaj nrhav koj.
Ca le sawv tseeg nqeg moog rua txheej huv qaab hab nrug puab moog tsw xob ua xyem xyaav, vem yog kuv khaiv puab tuaj.”
Petu txhad nqeg moog ntswb puab hab has tas, “Kuv yog tug kws mej tuaj nrhav ntaag. Mej tuaj tug kev daabtsw?”

Puab has tas, “Khaunelia yog ib tug thawj rog kaav ib puas leej hab yog ib tug ncaaj nceeg paub ntshai Vaajtswv hab yog ib tug muaj koob meej huv ib tsoom Yutai huvsw. Muaj ib tug tubkhai ntuj kws dawb huv kuas Khaunelia hu koj moog rua huv nwg lub tsev es yuav noog koj tej lug qha.”
Petu txhad hu puab lug su rua huv tsev. Nub tom qaab nwg sawv kev nrug puab moog, hab cov kwvtij qee leej huv lub moos Yaupa kuj nrug nwg moog hab.
Dhau dua ib nub tom qaab puab le moog txug lub moos Xixaleya. Khaunelia saamswm tog ntsoov puab hab hu nwg tej kwvtij kwvluag tuaj txoos ua ke.
Thaus Petu tuaj txug Khaunelia tuaj tog nwg hab pe khwb ti nkaus ntawm nwg kwtaw.
Petu ntsab nkaus Khaunelia tsaa sawv, hab has tas, “Ca le sawv, kuv kuj tsuas yog tuabneeg hab xwb.”
Thaus saamswm has lug Petu nkaag moog huv tsev mas pum tuabneeg nyob ua ke coob coob,

tes nwg txawm has rua puab tas, “Mej yeej paub tas qhov kws ib tug Yutai moog tshaam hab koom nrug lwm haiv tuabneeg ua ke yog yaam kws txhum kevcai heev. Tassws Vaajtswv qha tshwm rua kuv tas yuav tsw xob has tas ib tug twg qas lossws tsw dawb huv.
Vem le nuav, thaus mej hu kuv tuaj kuv txhad le tuaj tsw khuam cheem daabtsw. Kuv thov nug mej tas mej hu kuv tuaj tug kev daabtsw?”

Khaunelia has tas, “Tau plaub nub lug lawm kuv saamswm thov Vaajtswv huv kuv tsev kwvlaam lub swjhawm nuav yog nub qaij peb teev, txawm muaj ib tug yawm sawv ntawm kuv xubndag naav tsoog tsho ci nplaag.
Tug hov has tas, ‘Khaunelia, Vaajtswv tub nov koj tej lug thov hab ncu txug tej kws koj pub rua cov txom nyem lawm.
Vem le nuav ca le khaiv tuabneeg moog rua lub moos Yaupa hu Ximoo kws hu ua Petu tuaj. Nwg nyob huv tug Ximoo Kws luam tawv lub tsev ntawm ntug havtxwv.’
Kuv txhad khaiv tuabneeg moog hu koj taamswm, mas qhov kws koj tuaj kuj zoo lawm. Lub swjhawm nuav peb suavdawg nyob txhwj zog taab meeg Vaajtswv, tog noog txhua yaam kws tug Tswv kuas koj has.”
Petu txawm qheb ncauj has tas, “Kuv pum tseeb lawm tas Vaajtswv tsw saib leejtwg ntsej muag,
hab huv txhua haiv tuabneeg tug kws paub ntshai Vaajtswv hab xyum ncaaj nceeg kuj yog txaus Vaajtswv lub sab.
Mej yeej paub txug tej lug kws Vaajtswv muab cob rua cov Yixayee, yog qhov kws nwg pav txuj xuv zoo kws has txug nyob sab tug yeeg huv Yexu Kheto kws yog suavdawg tug Tswv.
Mej yeej paub tej xwm txheej kws tshwm thoob plawg lub xeev Yutia yog chiv huv lub xeev Kalilai ua qaab tug Yauhaa kws coj ua kevcai raus dej tshaaj tawm hov,

yog qhov kws has tas Vaajtswv muab Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kws dawb huv hab muab tug fwjchim laub rua huv Yexu kws yog tuabneeg Naxale le caag, hab qhov kws has tas Yexu moog moog lug lug ua tej num zoo hab khu txhua tug kws raug daab tswm txom le caag, vem yog Vaajtswv nrug nraim Yexu.
Peb ua timkhawv txug tej num huvsw kws nwg ua rua huv lub xeev Yutia hab huv lub nroog Yeluxalee. Puab muab nwg dai rua sau tug ntoo tua pov tseg
mas nub peb Vaajtswv tsaa nwg caj sawv rov lug hab pub nwg tshwm rua peb,
tsw yog tshwm rua tej tuabneeg suavdawg tassws tshwm rua peb pum xwb yog cov timkhawv kws Vaajtswv xaiv ca lawd. Ua qaab kws nwg caj sawv huv qhov tuag rov lug peb kuj nrug nwg noj haus ua ke.
Nwg has kuas peb tshaaj tawm hab ua timkhawv rua suavdawg tas Vaajtswv tub tsaa Yexu ua tug kws txav txem rua cov tuabneeg caj hab cov tuabneeg tuag.
Cov xwbfwb cev Vaajtswv lug suavdawg kuj ua timkhawv txug Yexu tas txhua tug kws ntseeg nwg tau txais kev zaam txem huv Yexu lub npe.”
Thaus Petu tseed saamswm has tej lug hov, Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kws dawb huv txawm lug rua sau txhua tug kws nov tej lug ntawd.
Cov kws tub ua kevcai txav hab ntseeg kws nrug Petu tuaj kuj phemfwj heev vem tas Vaajtswv hliv Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kws dawb huv rua lwm haiv tuabneeg hab,
tsua qhov puab nov cov tuabneeg hov has lwm yaam lug  hab qhuas ntxhas Vaajtswv. Petu txawm has tas,
“Leejtwg yuav txwv tau cov tuabneeg nuav kws tau txais Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kws dawb huv ib yaam le peb, tsw pub puab ua kevcai raus dej?”
Petu txhad has kuas muab puab ua kevcai raus dej huv Yexu Kheto lub npe. Puab thov kuas Petu nrug puab nyob ob peb nub.
Cov tubkhai hab cov kwvtij kws nyob huv Yutia nov xuv tas lwm haiv tuabneeg tub txais yuav Vaajtswv txujlug hab.
Thaus Petu moog txug huv lub nroog Yeluxalee cov ntseeg kws ua kevcai txav txawm ywg nwg tas,
“Ua caag koj moog rua huv cov tuabneeg kws tsw tau ua kevcai txav hab nrug puab noj mov ua ke?”
Petu txhad chiv pav ua ib qeb zuj zug rua puab noog tas,
“Thaus kuv nyob huv lub moos Yaupa hab saamswm thov Vaajtswv, kuv ua yug quas toog pum ib yaam zoo le ib daim ntaub daav daav khi plaub lub kaum tso nqeg sau ntuj lug ze ntawm kuv.
Kuv saib mas pum muaj tej tsaj nruab nqhuab plaub txhais teg taw, tsaj qus tsaj nkaag hab tej noog sau nruab ntug.
Hab kuv nov ib lub suab has rua kuv tas, ‘Petu, ca le sawv tseeg muab tua noj.’
Kuv has tas, ‘Tsw tau, tug Tswv, vem tas yaam kws qas lossws tsw dawb huv tsw txeev nkaag rua huv kuv lub qhov ncauj hlo le.’
Tassws lub suab rov has sau ntuj tuaj zag ob has tas, ‘Yaam kws Vaajtswv muab ntxuav lawm koj tsw xob has tas qas.’
Tej hov lug tshwm peb zag tes txhua yaam hov txawm raug muab nqaa rov moog sau ntuj lawm.
Mas taamswm hov txawm muaj peb tug yawm tuaj sawv ntawm lub tsev kws peb  nyob, puab raug khaiv huv lub moos Xixaleya tuaj cuag kuv.
Vaaj Ntsuj Plig txawm has kuas kuv nrug puab moog tsw xob ua xyem xyaav. Hab rau tug kwvtij nuav kuj nrug kuv moog, mas peb nkaag moog rua huv tug yawm hov lub tsev.

Nwg txhad pav rua peb noog tas nwg tau pum ib tug tubkhai ntuj tshwm lug rua huv nwg tsev le caag hab has rua nwg tas, ‘Ca le khaiv tuabneeg moog rua lub moos Yaupa hab coj Ximoo kws hu tas Petu tuaj,
mas nwg yuav qha txuj xuv zoo kws yuav cawm koj hab koj tsev tuabneeg dim.’
Thaus kuv chiv qha, Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kws dawb huv txawm nqeg lug rua sau puab ib yaam le thaus chiv thawj lug rua sau peb.
Mas kuv txhad ncu txug tug Tswv tej lug kws nwg has tas, ‘Yauhaa coj tuabneeg ua kevcai raus huv dej tassws mej yuav ua kevcai raus huv Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kws dawb huv.’
Yog Vaajtswv tub pub rua puab cov ib yaam le thaus peb ntseeg tug Tswv Yexu Kheto es pub rua peb, kuv yog leejtwg es kuv yuav taav Vaajtswv?”
Thaus puab nov tej lug hov lawd puab txawm tsw muaj lug has. Puab qhuas Vaajtswv has tas, “Vaajtswv tub pub lwm haiv tuabneeg ntxeev dua sab tshab txhad tau txujsa hab.”

Thaus Xatefanau raug muab tua hab cov ntseeg raug kev tswm txom, tes txawm tswv ua saab ua sua moog, ib txha moog txug lub xeev Finikia hab Xaipla hab lub moos Aathi‑au. Puab tsuas yog pav txuj xuv zoo rua cov Yutai noog xwb.
Puab cov hov muaj qee leej kws yog tuabneeg Xaipla hab tuabneeg Khulene moog txug huv lub moos Aathi‑au kuj pav txuj xuv zoo has txug tug Tswv Yexu rua cov tuabneeg Kili noog.
Hab Vaajtswv txhais teg nrug nraim puab, txhad muaj tuabneeg coob coob ntseeg hab tig lug cuag tug Tswv.
Tej xuv nuav nrov lug txug pawg ntseeg huv Yeluxalee, puab txhad khaiv Npananpa moog rua lub moos Aathi‑au.
Thaus Npananpa moog txug hab pum qhov kws Vaajtswv hlub puab nwg zoo sab xyiv faab. Nwg txhawb puab tug zug kuas puab suavdawg muab lub sab xwb hlo rua tug Tswv.
Npananpa yog ib tug tuabneeg zoo hab muaj Vaaj Ntsuj Plig hab kev ntseeg puv npo. Muaj tuabneeg coob lug ntseeg tug Tswv tsaav ntxwv.
Npananpa txhad moog nrhav Xolau ntawm lub moos Thaxa.

Thaus nrhav tau lawd, nwg txhad coj Xolau lug rua huv lub moos Aathi‑au. Ob tug koom ua ke rua huv pawg ntseeg tau ib xyoos hab qhuab qha cov ntseeg coob heev. Huv lub moos Aathi‑au nuav yog thawj zag kws cov ntseeg raug hu ua Khixatia.
Lub swjhawm hov muaj cov xwbfwb cev Vaajtswv lug tuaj huv Yeluxalee tuaj rua huv lub moos Aathi‑au.

Puab cov muaj ib tug hu ua Akanpa sawv tseeg lug has pum tom hauv ntej lawv le Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kuas nwg has, has tas yuav muaj kev tshaib plaab luj heev thoob plawg lub nplajteb. Tej xwm txheej nuav muaj tshwm lug rua ncua kws fuabtais Khaunti‑au kaav.
Cov thwjtim txhua tug has hum tas yuav pub nyaj lawv le txhua tug muab tau xaa moog paab cov kwvtij kws txom nyem huv lub xeev Yutia.
Puab kuj ua le ntawd mas muab rua Npananpa hab Xolau xaa moog rua cov kws saib cov ntseeg.
Thaus ntawd vaajntxwv Helauj tsaa teg hlo ua phem rua cov ntseeg qee leej.
Nwg xuas ntaaj tua Yauhaa tug tijlaug Yakaunpau.
Thaus nwg pum tas qhov kws nwg ua hov hum cov Yutai lub sab nwg kuj nteg Petu hab. Tej xwm txheej nuav tshwm rua thaus ua kevcai Noj Ncuav tsw Xyaw Keeb.

Thaus nteg Petu lawd txawm muab kaw rua huv tsev lojfaaj, hab muab cob rua plaub paab tub rog zuv ib paab muaj plaub leeg. Helauj npaaj sab ca tas thaus ua kevcai Hlaa Dhau taag lawm nwg yuav coj Petu lug rua cov pejxeem txav txem.
Vem le nuav Petu txhad raug kaw huv tsev lojfaaj. Tassws pawg ntseeg kub sab quas lug thov Vaajtswv paab Petu.
Mo ntawd ua ntej kws Helauj yuav coj Petu tawm lug txav txem, Petu saamswm tsaug zug huv nruab nraab ob tug tub rog, muaj ob txuj saw hlau khi hab muaj cov tub rog saamswm zuv qhov rooj tsev lojfaaj.

Mas txawm muaj tug Tswv  ib tug tubkhai ntuj tshwm plawg lug hab muaj duab ci nplaag rua huv chaav kws kaw. Tug tubkhai ntuj hov txawm daj Petu ib saab cev tsaa kuas sawv hab has tas, “Ca le sawv tseeg sai sai.” Ob txuj saw hlau kuj nplaam ntawm Petu teg lawm.
Tug tubkhai ntuj has rua Petu tas, “Ca le sa hlaab hab rau khau.” Petu kuj ua le ntawd. Hab has rua Petu tas, “Ca le kauv lub tsho ntev hab lawv kuv qaab moog.”
Petu txawm lawv qaab tawm moog. Nwg tsw paub tas qhov kws tug tubkhai ntuj ua hov yog tseeb, nwg xaav tas yog ua yug quas toog xwb.

Thaus ob tug hlaa dhau paab tub rog kws ib hab paab kws ob lawm, kuj lug txug lub qhov rooj hlau kws yog txujkev kws moog rua huv lub nroog. Txhwb qhov rooj hov ca le qheb rua ob tug moog, ob tug txhad hlaa tawm moog mas thaus taug txujkev tau ib nyuas ntu, tug tubkhai ntuj ca le pluj plag ntawm Petu lawm.
Thaus Petu feeb meej lawm nwg has tas, “Nwgnuav kuv paub tseeb tas tug Tswv khaiv nwg le tubkhai ntuj lug cawm kuv dim huv Helauj txhais teg hab dim qhov kws cov Yutai npaaj sab ua phem.”
Thaus Petu paub le ntawd lawm, nwg txawm moog rua ntawm Yauhaa kws muaj dua ib lub npe hu ua Malakau leej nam lub tsev. Qhov ntawd muaj ntau leej tuaj txoos ua ke thov Vaajtswv.
Thaus Petu khob rooj vaag muaj ib tug nkauj qhev hu ua Launta tawm moog saib.
Thaus nwg cim tau tas yog Petu lub suab nwg zoo sab heev, tes txawm tsw ncu qheb rooj vaag. Nwg ca le dha rov qaab moog has tas Petu sawv ntawm rooj vaag.
Puab txawm has rua nwg tas, “Koj vwm kaj.” Tassws nwg has khov kho tas yog tag tag le. Puab txawm has tas, “Yog tug tubkhai ntuj kws nrug nraim Petu xwb.”
Tassws Petu tseed khob khob rooj vaag. Thaus puab qheb rooj vaaj hab pum nwg, puab kuj phemfwj heev.

Petu cu teg rua puab kuas nyob tuabywv hab pav rua puab noog tas tug Tswv coj nwg tawm huv tsev lojfaaj lug le caag. Nwg has tas, “Ca le moog has zaaj nuav rua Yakaunpau hab cov kwvtij paub.” Tes Petu txawm tawm moog rua lwm qhov lawm.
Thaus kaaj ntug cov tub rog kuj ntxhuv heev tsua qhov kws puab tsw paub sov Petu ua le caag lawm.

Thaus Helauj nrhav tsw pum Petu, nwg tshuaj cov tub rog kws zuv tsev lojfaaj hov hab has kuas muab puab tua pov tseg. Tes Helauj txawm tawm huv lub xeev Yutia moog nyob rua huv lub moos Xixaleya lawm.

Helauj chim rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Thailab hab huv lub nroog Xaintoo. Cov tuabneeg txhad koom ua ib lub sab tuaj cuag nwg. Puab yum kuas Nplata kws saib vaajntxwv Helauj tsev paab puab has, tes puab le moog thov vaajntxwv Helauj kuas rov sws raug zoo, tsua qhov puab lub tebchaws yeej yuav mov noj huv vaajntxwv lub tebchaws.
Txug nub kws teem ca lawd Helauj naav nwg cev tsoog vaajntxwv hab nyob tsawg sau lub rooj txav txem hab ua lug zaaj lug zuag has lug rua puab.
Ib tsoom tuabneeg qw tas, “Nuav yog ib tug timtswv lub suab, tsw yog suab tuabneeg.”
Taamswm ntawd tug Tswv ib tug tubkhai ntuj txawm ntaus Helauj mob vem nwg tsw muab koob meej rua Vaajtswv, mas nwg txhad raug kaas muab noj txug tuag.
Tassws Vaajtswv txujlug fuam vaam tuaj hab nthuav daav quas zug moog.
Thaus Npananpa hab Xolau ua num taag, ob tug txawm tawm huv Yeluxalee moog, hab coj Yauhaa kws muaj dua npe hu ua Malakau moog hab.

Pawg ntseeg huv Aathi‑au muaj xwbfwb cev vaajtswv lug hab xwbfwb qha, yog Npananpa hab Xime‑oo kws hu ua Nikaw  hab Lukia kws yog tuabneeg Khulene, hab Mana‑ee kws nrug Helauj kws yog tug tswv xeev nyob luj hlub ua ke hab Xolau.
Thaus puab saamswm pe hawm tug Tswv hab yoo mov, Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kws dawb huv has tas, “Ca le muab Npananpa hab Xolau cais lug ua tej num kws kuv hu kuas ob tug ua.”
Thaus yoo mov hab thov Vaajtswv taag lawm puab txawm tsaa teg npuab sau Npananpa hab Xolau hab xaa ob tug moog.
Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kws dawb huv khaiv ob tug moog, ob tug txhad moog rua lub moos Xelukia hab caij nkoj deg hov ntawd moog rua lub koog povtxwv Xaipla.
Thaus moog txug lub moos Xalami, ob tug txawm pav Vaajtswv txujlug rua huv cov Yutai tej tsev sablaaj. Yauhaa kuj nyob rawv paab ob tug hab.
Thaus puab moog thoob plawg lub koog povtxwv lawm kuj lug txug lub moos Pafau mas ntswb ib tug yawm Yutai kws ua khawv koob yeeg swv hab yog ib tug cuav xwbfwb cev lug, npe hu ua Npalayexu.
Nwg nrug Xawkia Paulau kws ua tug thawj kaav Xaipla nyob. Tug thawj hov yog ib tug txawj ntse, nwg txawm hu Npananpa hab Xolau lug cuag nwg yuav noog Vaajtswv txujlug.
Elima kws ua khawv koob yeeg swv (nwg lub npe lub ntsab yeej yog le hov) nwg tawm tsaam ob tug. Nwg yooj xeeb ua kuas tug thawj kws kaav tebchaws hov xob ntseeg.
Tassws Xolau kws muaj dua ib lub npe hu ua Povlauj muaj Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kws dawb huv puv npo txawm saib ntsoov Elima,

hab has tas, “Koj yog Ntxwg Nyoog le tub, koj muaj kev daag ntxag hab kev phem puv nkaus, koj ua tshawj chim rua txhua txujkev ncaaj nceeg. Koj yuav tsw tseg qhov kws muab tug Tswv txujkev ncaaj ua kuas nkhaus lov?

Saib mas, nwgnuav tug Tswv txhais teg yuav rau txem rua koj, koj yuav dig muag tsw pum lub nub moog ib ntus.” Taamswm ntawd txawm muaj ib yaam zoo le fuab lug ua rua Elima qhov muag tsaus ndais tsw pum kev lawm nwg txhad xuas dub nrhav tuabneeg tuav nwg teg moog.
Thaus tug thawj kaav tebchaws pum tej xwm txheej kws tshwm lug hov nwg kuj ntseeg, tsua qhov nwg phemfwj rua tej lug kws qha txug tug Tswv.
Povlauj hab cov kws nrug nwg ua ke txawm caij nkoj ntawm lub moos Pafau moog txug lub moos Pawka huv lub xeev Pafilia. Yauhaa txawm ncaim puab rov moog rua Yeluxalee lawm.
Puab txawm taug kev ntawm lub moos Pawka moog txug lub moos Aathi‑au huv lub xeev Pixintia. Mas nub Xanpatau  puab moog nyob tsawg rua huv lub tsev sablaaj.

Thaus nyeem Vaajtswv txuj kevcai hab tej lug kws cov xwbfwb cev lug sau ca taag lawm, cov thawj saib lub tsev sablaaj txawm tso tuabneeg moog has rua Povlauj puab tas, “Cov kwvtij, yog mej muaj lug txhawb sab rua cov tuabneeg nuav kuj has tau.”
Povlauj txawm sawv tseeg tsaa teg has tas, “Mej haiv tuabneeg Yixayee hab mej cov kws paub ntshai Vaajtswv, ca le noog nawj.

Haiv tuabneeg Yixayee tug Vaajtswv xaiv peb tej puj koob yawm koob ca hab pub puab fuam vaam coob rua thaus puab ua qhua nyob huv Iyi tebchaws, hab tsaa hlo nwg txhais npaab coj puab tawm huv lub tebchaws hov.
Nwg ua sab ntev thev puab huv tebchaws moj saab qhua kwvlaam plaub caug xyoo.
Thaus nwg muab xyaa haiv tuabneeg huv Khana‑aa tebchaws ua puam tsuaj taag lawm nwg kuj muab puab lub tebchaws hov pub ua qub txeeg qub teg rua peb tej puj koob yawm koob,
lub swjhawm huvsw kwvlaam plaub puas tswb caug xyoo. Dhau ntawd nwg pub cov kws ua thawj rua puab, moog txug thaus Xamuyee kws yog xwbfwb cev Vaajtswv lug.
Thaus ntawd puab thov kuas muaj vaajntxwv, Vaajtswv txhad le pub Khij tug tub Xa‑u kws yog xeem Npeeyamee ua vaajntxwv kaav puab plaub caug xyoo.

Thaus muab Xa‑u hle lawm, Vaajtswv tsaa Tavi ua vaajntxwv kaav puab hab ua timkhawv has txug Tavi tas, ‘Kuv tau nrhav Yexi tug tub Tavi, kws hum kuv sab. Nwg yuav ua txhua yaam lawv le kuv lub sab xaav.’
Vaajtswv coj ib tug Cawmseej huv tug Tavi nuav caaj ceg lug rua cov Yixayee, yog Yexu, lawv le Vaajtswv cog lug tseg lawd.
Ua ntej Yexu lug, Yauhaa tub tshaaj tawm txug qhov kws ua kevcai raus dej kws qha has tas ntxeev dua sab tshab rua ib tsoom Yixayee suavdawg lawm.

Hab thaus Yauhaa ua num yuav tav, nwg has tas, ‘Mej xaav tas kuv yog leejtwg? Kuv tsw yog tug ntawd. Tassws muaj ib tug yuav ua kuv qaab lug, kuv tub tsw tswm nyog daws txuj hlua khau ntawm nwg kwtaw.’
“Cov kwvtij, mej cov kws yog Aplahaa caaj ceg hab mej cov kws paub ntshai Vaajtswv, txuj xuv zoo has txug kev dim nuav tub xaa tuaj txug peb lawm.

Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv Yeluxalee hab puab cov thawj tsw paub hab tsw nkaag sab cov xwbfwb cev lug tej lug kws txhua nub Xanpatau puab nyeem, puab txhad teem txem rua Yexu kuas tav lawv le tej lug hov.
Txawm yog tsw pum muaj kev txhum txaus tuag los puab kuj thov kuas Philaj muab nwg tua pov tseg.
Thaus puab ua txhua yaam tav lawv le sau txug nwg lawm, puab txawm muab nwg lub cev tuag txu sau ntoo lug hab muab nwg log rua huv lub qhov ntxaa.
Tassws Vaajtswv tsaa nwg caj sawv huv qhov tuag lug.
Ncua swjhawm ntau nub Yexu lug tshwm rua cov tuabneeg kws nrug nwg tuaj huv lub xeev Kalilai tuaj rua Yeluxalee pum, mas nwgnuav cov tuabneeg hov ua timkhawv txug nwg rua ib tsoom tuabneeg.
Peb coj txuj xuv zoo nuav qha rua mej tas tej lug kws cog tseg rua peb tej puj koob yawm koob hov

Vaajtswv tub ua tav le ntawd rua peb cov kws yog puab le tub ki, yog qhov kws nwg tsaa Yexu caj sawv rov lug. Kuj yog lawv le tej lug sau ca rua huv Ntawv Nkauj zaaj ob has tas, “ ‘Koj yog kuv tug tub, nub nua kuv yug tau koj lawm.’
Qhov kws Vaajtswv tsaa nwg caj huv qhov tuag rov lug tsw kheev nwg lwj moog, Vaajtswv kuj has le nuav tas, ‘Kuv yuav pub tej lug cog tseg dawb huv ruaj khov kws kuv cog rua Tavi lawd rua mej.’
Vem le ntawd Vaajtswv kuj has huv lwm qhov tas, ‘Koj yuav tsw kheev koj tug kws Dawb Huv lwj hlo le.’
Thaus Tavi ua nwg teg num lawv le Vaajtswv lub sab taag nwg swm neej, nwg kuj tuag  moog hab muab log nrug nwg tej laug hab nwg kuj lwj lawm,
tassws tug kws Vaajtswv tsaa caj sawv rov lug tsw lwj hlo le.
Vem le nuav, kwvtij 'e, ca le nkaag sab tas vem muaj tug nuav txhad muaj qhov kws tshaaj tawm kev zaam txem rua mej.
Hab vem muaj tug nuav txhua tug kws ntseeg txhad dim txhua yaam kws Mauxe txuj kevcai cawm tsw tau.
Vem le nuav mej yuav tsum ceev faaj tuab zoo sub tej lug kws cov xwbfwb cev lug has ntawd txhad tsw raug mej.

‘Mej cov kws thuaj luag ca le tsaa muag saib hab phemfwj hab puam tsuaj, tsua qhov lub swjhawm kws mej nyob, kuv saamswm yuav ua yaam kws yog muaj tuabneeg has rua mej ua ntej los mej yuav tsw ntseeg.’ ”
Thaus Povlauj hab Npananpa tawm moog, cov tuabneeg hov kuj thov kuas ob tug rov has tej lug hov rua puab noog rua nub Xanpatau tom ntej.

Thaus kaw kev sablaaj lawm cov Yutai hab cov kws lug coj Yutai kevcai nruj ntau leej txawm lawv Povlauj hab Npananpa qaab moog. Ob tug txhad has rua puab hab txhawb puab lub sab kuas nyob rua huv Vaajtswv txujkev hlub moog le.
Thaus rov txug nub Xanpatau yuav luag taag cov tuabneeg huv lub moos tuaj txoos ua ke noog tug Tswv txujlug.
Thaus cov Yutai pum muaj tuabneeg coob heev, puab txawm khib heev, hab caam tej lug kws Povlauj has hab has lug saib tsw taug nwg.

Povlauj hab Npananpa muaj sab tuab has tas, “Yuav tsum pav Vaajtswv txujlug rua mej ua ntej. Tassws mej tsw leeg yuav hab txav sab mej tug kheej tas tsw tswm nyog tau txujsa ib txhws tsw kawg, vem le nuav peb yuav tig moog rua lwm haiv tuabneeg.
Tsua qhov tug Tswv has rua peb tas, “ ‘Kuv tsaa koj ua qhov kaaj ci moog rua lwm haiv tuabneeg sub koj txhad tau coj txujkev dim moog txug qaab ntuj kawg.’ ”
Thaus lwm haiv tuabneeg nov tej lug hov lawd puab kuj zoo sab kawg hab qhuas tug Tswv txujlug. Txhua tug kws tub xaiv ca kuas tau txujsa ib txhws tsw kawg kuj lug ntseeg.
Tug Tswv txujlug txhad le nthuav thoob plawg tebchaws ntawd.

Tassws cov Yutai tshaum cov quaspuj muaj koob meej kws fwm Vaajtswv nruj hab cov quasyawg kws ua thawj huv lub moos hov kuas tswm txom Povlauj hab Npananpa, hab lawv kuas ob tug tawm huv puab le kaav xyuam moog.
Povlauj hab Npananpa txawm nchus tej moov aav kws lu ob tug kwtaw taab meeg puab tes txawm moog rua huv lub moos Ikhauniyu lawm.
Cov thwjtim zoo sab xyiv faab heev hab puv npo Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kws dawb huv.
Huv lub moos Ikhauniyu Povlauj hab Npananpa moog rua huv cov Yutai lub tsev sablaaj ib yaam le txeev moog hab qha raug sab mas cov Yutai hab cov Kili txhad lug ntseeg coob.
Tassws cov Yutai kws tsw ntseeg tshaum kuas lwm haiv tuabneeg xaav phem rua cov kwvtij kws ntseeg.

Vem le nuav ob tug txhad nyob qhov chaw ntawd ntev, muaj lub sab tuab pav txug tug Tswv, hab tug Tswv pub kuas ob tug ua tau txujci tseem ceeb hab txujci phemfwj txhad qhwv tau tej lug kws has txug Vaajtswv txujkev hlub.
Tes cov tuabneeg huv lub moos hov txawm tawg ua ob paab, ib paab nrug cov Yutai ib paab nrug cov tubkhai.
Thaus lwm haiv tuabneeg hab cov Yutai hab puab cov thawj tuav huv yuav ua phem xuas pob zeb ntaus ob tug,
ob tug kuj paub lawm, txawm tswv moog rua lub xeev Likhaunia moog rua lub moos Lixatha hab lub moos Ntawnpi hab tej zej zog ib ncig,
hab pav txuj xuv zoo rua hov ntawd.
Huv lub moos Lixatha muaj ib tug yawm nyob tsawg ob txhais kwtaw moog tsw tau kev. Nwg tuag taw txwj thau yug lug tsw tau txeev moog kev le.
Nwg noog Povlauj has, mas Povlauj saib ntsoov nwg pum tas nwg muaj kev ntseeg txaus khu nwg tug mob zoo,
Povlauj txawm qw nrov has tas, “Ca le sawv tseeg sawv ntsug.” Tug yawm hov txawm sawv tseeg caws qa dha moog kev.
Thaus cov tuabneeg pum tej kws Povlauj ua, puab txawm tsaa suab qw has lug Likhaunia tas, “Tej timtswv txa ua tuabneeg nqeg lug txug peb lawm.”
Puab txawm tis npe rua Npananpa hu ua Xu hab tis npe rua Povlauj hu ua Hawme vem Povlauj yog tug txwv lug.
Tug povthawj kws teev tug txoov daab Xu kws nyob saab nrau lub moos txawm coj txwv nyuj hab paaj ntoo tuaj rua ntawm rooj loog yuav nrug cov pejxeem ua kevcai xyeem rua ob tug.
Thaus Npananpa hab Povlauj nov le hov ob tug txawm dua pis rhe ob tug tej rwg tsho hab dha moog rua huv cov tuabneeg hov hab qw has tas,

“Mej suavdawg, mej ua daabtsw le nuav? Ib kuj yog tuabneeg thooj ib yaam le mej xwb, hab ib coj txuj xuv zoo tuaj rua mej kuas mej tig hlo ntawm tej kev kws tsw muaj qaabhau nuav lug cuag Vaajtswv tug kws muaj txujsa nyob, yog tug kws tswm lub ntuj hab lub nplajteb hab dej havtxwv hab txhua yaam kws muaj nyob rua huv.
Yaav taag lug Vaajtswv ca ib tsoom tuabneeg suavdawg nyag moog lawv le nyag txujkev.

Tassws nwg pheej qha nwg rua mej paub tsw tu ncua, tsua qhov nwg ua zoo rua mej hab pub naag lug sau ntuj lug hab pub muaj qoob loos lawv caij lawv nyoog rua mej, hab pub mej muaj noj tsau npo hab muaj kev zoo sab.”
Txawm yog has le ntawd lawm, los ob tug ceblaaj txwv puab kuas tsw xob xyeem tej hov rua ob tug.

Muaj cov Yutai qee leej tuaj tim lub moos Aathi‑au hab lub moos Ikhauniyu tuaj. Puab tshaum cov pejxeem mas puab xuas pob zeb ntaus Povlauj hab muab nwg hai tawm huv lub moos moog, puab xaav tas nwg tuag lawm.
Tassws thaus cov thwjtim tuaj vej nkaus nwg, nwg txawm sawv tseeg moog rua huv lub moos. Nub tom qaab nwg nrug Npananpa moog rua huv lub moos Ntawnpi.
Thaus ob tug pav txuj xuv zoo huv lub moos hov hab coj tuabneeg lug ua thwjtim coob coob, ob tug txawm rov moog rua lub moos Lixatha hab lub moos Ikhauniyu hab lub moos Aathi‑au.
Ob tug txhawb cov thwjtim muaj zug tuaj hab txhawb kuas puab nyob ruaj huv txujkev ntseeg hab has tas, “Peb yuav tsum raug kev txom nyem ntau yaam txhad nkaag tau rua huv Vaajtswv lub tebchaws.”
Thaus ob tug tsaa cov kws saib cov ntseeg rua txhua qhov lawm, ob tug kuj yoo mov thov Vaajtswv hab muab puab cob rua tug Tswv kws puab ntseeg.
Ob tug hlaa lub xeev Pixintia lug txug lub xeev Pafilia
Thaus ob tug qha Vaajtswv txujlug rua huv lub moos Pawka taag lawm, ob tug txawm nqeg moog rua lub moos Athalia,
hab caij nkoj hov ntawd moog rua lub moos Aathi‑au, yog lub moos kws muab ob tug cob rua huv Vaajtswv txujkev hlub kuas moog ua tej num kws ob tug tub ua tav lawm.
Thaus lug txug, ob tug hu pawg ntseeg tuaj txoos ua ke hab pav txhua yaam kws Vaajtswv swv ob tug ua hab pav txug qhov kws Vaajtswv qheb qhov rooj rua lwm haiv tuabneeg lug ntseeg le caag.
Mas ob tug nrug cov thwjtim nyob hov ntawd ntev loo.
Muaj qee leej tuaj huv lub xeev Yutia tuaj qhuab qha cov kwvtij has tas, “Yog tsw ua kevcai txav lawv le Mauxe kevcai, mej kuj tsw dim.”

Thaus Povlauj hab Npananpa nrug puab cov sws caam heev lawd, cov ntseeg txawm tsaa Povlauj hab Npananpa hab lwm tug kuas moog sablaaj rua cov tubkhai hab cov saib cov ntseeg huv lub nroog Yeluxalee txug zaaj kws sws caam hov.

Pawg ntseeg txhad xaa puab moog. Thaus puab taug kev hlaa huv lub xeev Finikia hab lub xeev Xamali moog, puab pav txug qhov kws lwm haiv tuabneeg ntxeev dua sab tshab mas ua rua cov kwvtij suavdawg zoo sab heev kawg.
Thaus tuaj txug Yeluxalee, pawg ntseeg hab cov tubkhai hab cov saib cov ntseeg kuj tog txais puab, mas puab pav txhua yaam kws Vaajtswv swv puab ua rua cov ntawd noog.
Tassws cov Falixai kws ntseeg qee leej sawv tseeg has tas, “Yuav tsum muab puab ua kevcai txav, hab nkaw lug kuas puab coj lawv le Mauxe txuj kevcai.”
Cov tubkhai hab cov kws saib pawg ntseeg txhad sau zog ua ke sablaaj txug zaaj nuav.

Thaus sws caam ntev lawm, Petu txawm sawv tseeg has tas, “Cov kwvtij, mej yeej paub tas thaus chiv thawj Vaajtswv xaiv kuv huv mej lug ua tug kws pav txuj xuv zoo rua lwm haiv tuabneeg nov hab ntseeg.
Vaajtswv, tug kws paub tuabneeg lub sab, tub qhwv puab hab pub Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kws dawb huv rua puab ib yaam le kws pub rua peb.
Nwg tsw cais peb hab puab, hab vem puab ntseeg nwg ntxuav puab lub sab kuas dawb huv.
Yog le ntawd nwgnuav ua caag mej tseed swm Vaajtswv es muab tug quab tso rua sau cov thwjtim caaj qwb yog yaam kws peb tej laug hab peb rws tsw taug lawm?
Tassws peb ntseeg has tas peb yuav dim vem muaj tug Tswv Yexu txujkev hlub, mas puab yuav dim le hov hab.”
Ib tsoom suavdawg nyob tuabywv hab noog Npananpa hab Povlauj pav txug tej txujci tseem ceeb hab txujci phemfwj kws Vaajtswv swv ob tug ua rua huv plawv lwm haiv tuabneeg.
Thaus pav taag lawd, Yakaunpau txhad has tas, “Cov kwvtij, ca le noog kuv has.
Ximoo tub pav tas Vaajtswv lug saib lwm haiv tuabneeg thawj zag le caag hab xaiv ib pawg tawm huv puab ua nwg le tuabneeg.
Tej lug kws cov xwbfwb cev Vaajtswv lug tau has tseg kuj hum zaaj nuav, lawv le kws sau ca has tas,
“ ‘Tom qaab ntawd kuv yuav rov lug tswm Tavi lub tsev kws pob taag dua tshab. Kuv yuav khu tej kws pob taag hab tsaa dua tshab,
sub ib tsoom tuabneeg hab lwm haiv tuabneeg suavdawg kws hu lawv le kuv lub npe txhad lug nrhav tug Tswv. Tug Tswv has le nuav ntaag,
nwg tub qha kuas paub thau u lug lawm.’
Vem le nuav lawv le kuv pum zoo mas peb tsw xob ua ceblaaj rua lwm haiv tuabneeg kws tig lug cuag Vaajtswv,

tassws ca peb sau ntawv moog has kuas puab tseg tsw xob noj yaam kws qas tsw huv kws muab xyeem rua txoov daab, tsw xob ua nkauj ua nraug, tsw xob noj tej tsaj kws zawm cej daab tuag hab tsw xob noj ntshaav.
Tsua qhov txwj thau u lug txhua lub moos yeej muaj tuabneeg tshaaj tawm txug Mauxe hab muab nwg tej lug nyeem rua txhua nub Xanpatau huv tej tsev sablaaj.”

Thaus ntawd cov tubkhai hab cov kws saib pawg ntseeg hab pawg ntseeg suavdawg pum zoo yuav xaiv qee leej huv puab nrug Npananpa hab Povlauj moog rua lub moos Aathi‑au. Puab xaiv Yutas kws muaj dua ib lub npe hu ua Npaxanpa hab Xila, ob tug yog cov kws ua thawj huv cov kwvtij.

Puab sau tsaab ntawv rua ob tug xaa moog has tas, “Peb cov kwvtij, kws yog tubkhai hab cov kws saib pawg ntseeg, muaj lug zoo sab tuaj rua cov kwvtij kws yog lwm haiv tuabneeg huv lub moos Aathi‑au hab huv lub xeev Xilia hab lub xeev Khilikia.
Vem yog peb nov tas peb cov qee leej kws tsw yog peb khaiv tuaj los kuj tau tuaj has ua rua mej ntxhuv sab hab tsw pum qaab xaav lawm,
peb txhad pum zoo ua ib lub sab xaiv qee leej khaiv nrug Npananpa hab Povlauj kws peb hlub tuaj cuag mej,
yog ob tug kws sev nyog txujsa vem saib rua peb tug Tswv Yexu Kheto lub npe.
Vem le nuav peb txhad xaa Yutas hab Xila tuaj, mas ob tug yuav xuas qhov ncauj pav tuab zaaj nuav rua mej noog.
Tsua qhov Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kws dawb huv hab peb pum zoo tsw xob muab lub nraa nyaav rua mej rws tsuas yog tej yaam kws cheem tsum xwb,

yog tseg tsw xob noj tej kws xyeem rua txoov daab, tsw xob noj ntshaav, tsw xob noj tej tsaj kws zawm cej daab tuag hab tsw xob ua nkauj ua nraug. Yog mej tseg tau tej nuav kuj yog mej ua zoo lawm. Thov kuas noj qaab nyob zoo.”
Thaus sws xob taag lawm, puab txawm moog rua lub moos Aathi‑au. Thaus hu suavdawg tuaj txoos ua ke, tes txawm muab tsaab ntawv cob rua puab.
Thaus muab nyeem lawm puab kuj zoo sab xyiv faab rua tej lug txhawb sab ntawd.
Yutas hab Xila kws yog xwbfwb cev Vaajtswv lug txawm has lug txhawb cov kwvtij lub sab ntau yaam hab paab puab muaj zug.
Thaus ob tug nrug puab nyob ib ntus lawm, cov kwvtij txawm xob ob tug moog zoo rov lug rua huv pawg ntseeg kws xaa ob tug tuaj.
